fields.product_name: Redragon M718 Phoenix-2 10000 DPI RGB Gaming Mouse
fields.short_description: 10000 DPI, SUPPORT : PC WITH USB PORT
fields.description:
Step up your gaming performance with the Redragon M718 Phoenix-2 RGB Backlit Gaming Mouse, engineered for competitive gamers who demand precision, speed, and customization. Whether you’re battling in FPS, MMO, or MOBA games, this mouse gives you the tools to stay ahead of your competition.

Precision & Adjustable DPI
The Phoenix-2 offers up to 10,000 DPI, allowing you to fine-tune sensitivity for different games and playstyles. Switch DPI on the fly to achieve pinpoint accuracy during intense firefights or lightning-fast maneuvers, giving you complete control over your gameplay.

Customizable Buttons & Macros
With 11 programmable buttons, the M718 Phoenix-2 lets you map macros, complex commands, or shortcuts to streamline your in-game actions. This level of customization ensures you can execute combos, skill rotations, and critical actions effortlessly.

Vibrant RGB Backlighting
Personalize your setup with fully customizable RGB lighting effects. Choose from a wide spectrum of colors and effects to match your mood, style, or gaming setup. The RGB illumination not only looks stunning but also makes it easier to identify active profiles during gameplay.

Ergonomic & Durable Design
Designed for long gaming sessions, the M718 Phoenix-2 features an ergonomic shape that fits naturally in your hand, reducing fatigue and ensuring maximum comfort. Built with a durable construction, it withstands the rigors of daily gaming, promising years of reliable performance.

Advanced Gaming Sensor
Equipped with the Avago Top-Speed Gaming Engine, the Phoenix-2 delivers accurate tracking, fast response times, and smooth cursor movement. Every flick, swipe, and click translates perfectly on screen, giving you a competitive edge.

Key Features:

  • Adjustable 10000 DPI for precise control

  • 11 programmable buttons for advanced macros

  • Fully RGB backlit customization

  • Ergonomic design for extended comfort

  • Durable, long-lasting build quality

  • Avago Top-Speed sensor for fast and accurate tracking

The Redragon M718 Phoenix-2 is the ultimate choice for gamers seeking precision, speed, and style in one high-performance package. Dominate your games with confidence, control, and flair.

fields.description:
VIEWSONIC LS740HD 3RD GENERATION LASER PHOSPHOR TECHNOLOGY PROJECTOR (5,000 ANSI Lumens, HD (1920 x
1080), Throw Ratio: 1.18~1.54, Image size: 30” – 300”, Throw Distance: 0.77-9.98m (100″@2.5m), 1.3X Optical zoom, Non
Stop 24/7 Operation, IP6X (dust protected), Speaker 15W, USB TYPE A supply power to wireless HDMI Dongle, H/V
Keystone & 4 Corner Adjustment, 360o Projection, Portrait Mode, Contrast ratio: 3000000:1, HDMI x 2 & RS232).

 

Experience next-level projection with the ViewSonic LS740HD 5,000 ANSI Lumens 1080p Laser Installation Projector. Designed for professional environments, it delivers brilliant Full HD visuals, exceptional brightness, and long-lasting reliability powered by laser phosphor technology.

With 5,000 ANSI Lumens of brightness and SuperColor™ technology, the LS740HD ensures vivid, true-to-life images even in well-lit spaces. Its maintenance-free laser light source offers up to 30,000 hours of lifespan, significantly reducing operating costs compared to traditional lamp-based projectors.

The projector’s 1.3x optical zoom, 360° projection, and portrait mode support provide flexible installation options for conference rooms, classrooms, retail displays, or auditoriums. With comprehensive connectivity (HDMI, LAN, USB, and more), it’s built for versatile professional use.

  • Full HD 1080p resolution for sharp, detailed visuals

  • 5,000 ANSI Lumens brightness for bright environments

  • Long-lasting laser light source (up to 30,000 hours)

  • SuperColor™ technology for rich, accurate colors

  • Flexible installation: 360° projection & portrait mode

  • Low maintenance and eco-friendly design

  • Ideal for business, education, and large venues

The CENTAUR 2 features quiet membrane switches that provide a soft yet tactile typing experience. Each keypress delivers consistent feedback without disturbing your teammates or those around you, making it perfect for late-night gaming or focused office work.

Built with 104 standard keys and double-shot injection molded keycaps, the keyboard is designed to withstand heavy use while maintaining its legibility and responsiveness. Its metal and ABS construction ensures long-lasting durability, giving you confidence in both gaming and everyday use.

Customize your gaming setup with the keyboard’s seven-color rainbow backlighting and 10 lighting effects. Whether you prefer a subtle glow or a dynamic light show, you can mix and match modes to suit your mood or game environment, bringing your setup to life.

Gain a competitive edge with 26 conflict-free keys and anti-ghosting support, ensuring that every keystroke is registered accurately during fast-paced gaming. This feature is essential for executing combos, shortcuts, and commands without missing a beat.

Convenient Multimedia Controls
With 12 dedicated multimedia keys, you can easily control your music, videos, and system functions without interrupting your gameplay. This makes it simple to stay focused while managing your entertainment.

Easy Connectivity and Compatibility
The CENTAUR 2 connects via a standard USB-A port and supports Windows operating systems with a QWERTY layout, offering plug-and-play convenience. Its lightweight design and compact footprint make it suitable for any desk setup.

fields.product_name: SilverStone HYD120-ARGB-V2 White 120mm Liquid Cooler
fields.short_description:
• Dual tower CPU cooler with dual fans and 6 copper heat-pipes ensuring the best thermal conducting efficiency
  • Fin offset design eliminates interference between memory modules and CPU cooler on LGA1200 motherboards
  • 9 bladed high performance 120mm PWM controlled fans, with fan speed range of 0~1850 RPM**
  • Each fan includes 8 ARGB LEDs which can be controlled by ARGB controllers or capable motherboards***
  • Anti-vibrational rubber pads included for additional noise dampening
  • Spring screws mounting design with long screw driver included for firm and straight forward installation for both Intel and AMD* platforms
fields.description:
Experience exceptional cooling performance, whisper-quiet operation, and breathtaking aesthetics with the SilverStone HYD120-ARGB-V2 (White) — a next-generation 120mm ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler designed for gamers, creators, and PC enthusiasts who demand performance without compromise.

With its premium all-white design, powerful cooling capability, and vivid addressable RGB lighting, the HYD120-ARGB-V2 delivers both functionality and visual perfection, making it the centerpiece of any modern build.

❄️ Unmatched Cooling Efficiency

At the heart of the SilverStone HYD120-ARGB-V2 lies a meticulously engineered hydro-bearing pump paired with a high-density 120mm aluminum radiator. This combination ensures rapid heat dissipation and long-term stability even under the most intense CPU loads.

Whether you’re gaming for hours, rendering videos, or multitasking with demanding applications, this cooler keeps your CPU temperatures under control — ensuring consistent performance and longer hardware life.

Performance Highlights:

  • High-speed pump for superior coolant circulation

  • Low-evaporation sleeved tubing for stable thermal transfer

  • Optimized micro-fin copper base for maximum heat absorption

  • Reinforced fittings for leak-resistant reliability

SilverStone’s precision-engineered cold plate ensures every drop of coolant moves efficiently, drawing away heat faster than conventional coolers. This results in lower CPU temperatures, improved system stability, and optimal performance even during overclocking.

🌈 Dynamic ARGB Lighting with Full Sync Support

The HYD120-ARGB-V2 White isn’t just a cooler — it’s a visual statement. Featuring brilliant 5V 3-pin addressable RGB lighting, it illuminates your rig with smooth, customizable color effects.

Whether you’re aiming for a clean white glow or a multi-color RGB spectrum, the lighting is fully compatible with leading motherboard software for seamless synchronization:

  • ASUS Aura Sync

  • MSI Mystic Light

  • Gigabyte RGB Fusion

  • ASRock Polychrome Sync

You can personalize every lighting zone — from subtle breathing effects to dynamic rainbow waves — creating the perfect atmosphere for your gaming setup or workstation.

The vivid ARGB illumination on both the pump block and fan enhances your build’s overall visual appeal, especially for white or minimal-themed PC builds.

🧊 Premium 120mm ARGB Fan – Quiet & Powerful

The included 120mm ARGB PWM fan strikes the perfect balance between airflow, pressure, and silence. Designed for maximum cooling efficiency, its precision-engineered fan blades push high volumes of air through the radiator fins while maintaining low noise output.

Fan Specifications:

  • Speed: 800–2000 RPM ±10%

  • Airflow: Up to 80 CFM

  • Static Pressure: 2.6 mmH₂O

  • Noise Level: 15–33 dBA

  • Bearing Type: Long-life Hydro Bearing

Even during heavy gaming or rendering, the fan remains remarkably quiet — ideal for users who value both performance and acoustic comfort. Rubber-damped corners minimize vibration noise, ensuring a smooth, stable operation.

⚙️ Wide CPU Socket Compatibility

The SilverStone HYD120-ARGB-V2 (White) supports a broad range of Intel and AMD sockets, making it versatile for nearly every modern build.

Supported Sockets:

  • Intel: LGA 1700 / 1200 / 115X / 1366

  • AMD: AM5 / AM4 / AM3+ / FM2+

Whether you’re running the latest Intel 14th Gen processor or AMD Ryzen 7000 series, this cooler provides optimal compatibility and secure installation. SilverStone includes reinforced mounting brackets for a vibration-free, snug fit that ensures stability over time.

💪 Built for Durability & Longevity

SilverStone is known for precision, reliability, and durability — and the HYD120-ARGB-V2 continues that legacy. Every component is crafted with attention to detail, ensuring performance that lasts for years.

  • Reinforced, leak-resistant tubing: Designed to handle long-term coolant flow without wear or evaporation.

  • Premium pump motor: Quiet operation and reliable performance across thousands of hours of use.

  • Copper cold plate: Corrosion-resistant and designed for optimal thermal conductivity.

You can trust this cooler to maintain consistent temperatures and silent operation even after extended use.

Warranty: Backed by SilverStone’s 2-year manufacturer warranty under standard usage conditions.

🧠 Smart Engineering, Clean White Aesthetics

Aesthetically refined and technically superior — the HYD120-ARGB-V2 (White) is crafted for builders who value both beauty and performance. The pure matte white design seamlessly complements white or light-themed builds, creating a unified, elegant look.

Pair it with white RAM modules, GPU, and case interiors for a minimal yet stunning setup. The cooler’s lighting can be synchronized with the rest of your components, giving your PC a cohesive glow that enhances its premium feel.

Every aspect, from the sleek radiator finish to the soft diffused ARGB ring on the fan, reflects SilverStone’s attention to craftsmanship.

🧩 Easy Installation

SilverStone ensures that even first-time builders can install the HYD120-ARGB-V2 effortlessly. The tool-free mounting mechanism, pre-applied thermal paste, and detailed user manual make setup quick and straightforward.

Its compact 120mm radiator size ensures wide case compatibility — fitting comfortably into mid-tower, mini-tower, and even compact ITX builds.

The flexible tubing and swivel fittings allow for neat routing and proper cable management, keeping your build clean and clutter-free.

🔍 Specifications Summary

Type: 120mm ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler
Radiator Material: Aluminum

Fan Size: 120mm x 25mm

💡 Why Choose SilverStone HYD120-ARGB-V2 (White)?

Because this cooler combines beauty, performance, and silence — all in one package. Here’s what makes it stand out:

✅ Powerful Cooling Performance – Keeps even high-end CPUs cool during heavy workloads.
✅ Silent Operation – Optimized fan and pump ensure quiet running.

✅ Wide Compatibility – Supports major Intel and AMD platforms.
✅ Durability & Reliability – Built with SilverStone’s renowned craftsmanship.

The SilverStone HYD120-ARGB-V2 White is not just a CPU cooler — it’s an investment in performance, aesthetics, and peace of mind.

🎮 Ideal for Gamers, Creators, and PC Enthusiasts

Whether you’re a hardcore gamer pushing your CPU to its limits, a content creator rendering 4K videos, or a builder seeking the perfect visual setup — this cooler is made for you.

Its superior thermal management ensures stable frame rates, longer CPU life, and smoother performance — while the ARGB design turns your system into a work of art.

🏆 The SilverStone Advantage

SilverStone has long been recognized as one of the most trusted names in PC cooling and chassis solutions. With the HYD120-ARGB-V2, they’ve once again raised the bar for what a 120mm AIO can deliver — precision cooling, reliable operation, and unmatched aesthetics.

If you’re upgrading your current cooler or building a new PC from scratch, the HYD120-ARGB-V2 (White) is an easy choice for anyone who values performance and beauty in equal measure.

fields.description:
Upgrade your gaming rig with the After Shock Rapid Glass Case, a mid-tower chassis designed for high-performance e-sports and gaming PCs. Combining sleek aesthetics, superior airflow, and RGB customization, this case is perfect for gamers and PC enthusiasts who want both style and functionality.

High-Airflow Design for Maximum Cooling
The After Shock Rapid emphasizes airflow with its finely meshed front panel and multiple venting options. It supports top, front, and rear fans, ensuring your components stay cool even during the most intense gaming sessions. With support for up to 3 front 120 mm fans, 2 top fans, and 1 rear fan, plus radiator compatibility for liquid cooling, this chassis keeps your system performing at its best.

Tempered Glass Side Panel
Showcase your build with the tempered glass side panel. Perfect for displaying high-end components, RGB lighting, and custom water-cooling setups, it turns your gaming PC into a visual centerpiece.

Stunning RGB/LED Lighting Support
Included 3 ARGB fans bring dynamic, customizable lighting to your rig. Whether you want subtle glow effects or vibrant patterns, the After Shock Rapid provides full support for modern RGB ecosystems, creating a personalized gaming atmosphere.

Convenient Removable Panels and Dust Filters
Cleaning and maintenance are easy thanks to the removable front panel and dust filter design. Simply pop off the panels, clean your filters, and enjoy a dust-free interior that protects your components.

Compact Yet Capable
This mid-tower chassis balances a compact footprint with impressive compatibility. It supports standard ATX, Micro-ATX, and Mini-ITX motherboards, GPUs up to standard full-length size, CPU coolers up to ~155 mm, and multiple radiator configurations.

Technical Highlights:

  • Chassis Type: Mid-tower

  • Dimensions: 383 × 222 × 407 mm

  • I/O Ports: 1 × USB 2.0, 1 × USB 3.0, 1 × combined audio jack

  • Cooling Support: 3 × 120 mm front, 2 × 120 mm top, 1 × 120 mm rear fan

  • Radiator Support: Top 240 mm, front (variant dependent), rear 120 mm

  • Drive Bays: 2 × 3.5" HDD (or 1 × 3.5" + 1 × 2.5" SSD)

  • Motherboard Compatibility: ATX, Micro-ATX, Mini-ITX

  • Expansion Slots: 7 PCIe slots

  • Materials: Steel chassis with tempered glass side panel

  • Airflow/Dust Filter: Removable front panel with dust filter

Why Choose After Shock Rapid?

  • Optimized airflow keeps your PC cool under load

  • ARGB fans and tempered glass provide an eye-catching aesthetic

  • Supports a wide range of cooling solutions and component sizes

  • Removable panels and filters simplify cleaning and maintenance

  • Compact mid-tower design ideal for both gaming and performance builds

Whether you’re building a high-end e-sports PC or a stylish gaming setup, the After Shock Rapid Glass Case with 3 ARGB Fans combines performance, style, and convenience. Its thoughtful design, superior cooling, and customizable RGB lighting make it a must-have for serious gamers and PC enthusiasts.

fields.product_name: Forzer FR-400 RGB CPU Cooler - Compact & Efficient
fields.short_description:
• FROZER FR-400
  • 4 Heatpipe CPU cooler
  • 90mm RGB Fan
  • Available in Black and White
fields.description:
Keep your PC running cool and stylish with the Forzer FR-400 CPU Cooler, engineered for efficient heat dissipation and eye-catching RGB aesthetics. Perfect for gamers, content creators, and PC enthusiasts, this cooler combines compact design, reliable performance, and customizable lighting for an all-around premium experience.

High-Efficiency Cooling Structure
At the heart of the FR-400’s performance are four direct-contact copper heatpipes that touch the CPU’s Integrated Heat Spreader (IHS). This direct-contact design rapidly absorbs heat from your processor, transferring it efficiently into the tower-style heatsink. With a large aluminum fin array, the FR-400 ensures your CPU stays stable even under moderate to heavy workloads, making it a significant upgrade over standard stock coolers.

Illuminated RGB Fan
The FR-400 features a 90mm RGB fan that delivers effective airflow while maintaining a compact form factor. Its smaller size makes it ideal for tight or narrow cases without sacrificing cooling performance. The fan also supports RGB lighting, either static or addressable, allowing you to synchronize it with popular motherboard RGB software such as ASUS Aura Sync or MSI Mystic Light. This integration ensures your system not only stays cool but looks vibrant and cohesive.

Aesthetic Versatility
Choose the cooler that best matches your PC’s theme. The FR-400 comes in Black and White options, giving you the freedom to create a sleek, subtle build with the classic black or make your RGB lighting pop with the modern white version. Its stylish design enhances any setup while keeping the cooler functional and efficient.

Performance and Compatibility
Designed to handle CPUs with an estimated TDP of 100W–150W, the FR-400 is suitable for mid-range Intel Core i5/i7 and AMD Ryzen 5/7 processors. Its multi-platform support ensures compatibility with a wide range of sockets:

  • Intel: LGA 1700, 1200, 115X

  • AMD: AM5, AM4

This versatility makes it a reliable choice for both new builds and upgrades, offering a perfect balance of performance, size, and aesthetics.

The Forzer FR-400 RGB CPU Cooler delivers efficient cooling, compact design, and stunning RGB lighting for PC enthusiasts who value both performance and style. Elevate your system’s cooling and visual appeal with this space-conscious, powerful cooler.

fields.short_description: 7 colors fancy backlit 4 level of brightness LED lightAdjustable breathing speed rate of LED light116 standard keys32 non-conflict keys 12 multimedia keys8 programmable keys14 holes on base for water go through2 adjusting gear for input speedInterchangeable "↑ ← ↓ →" keys and "WASD" keysWIN keys can be disabled when gaming
fields.description:
Level up your gaming setup with the Redragon K501 ASURA 2 Gaming Keyboard, a high-performance keyboard designed for both hardcore gamers and everyday users who value precision and style. Engineered with durability, comfort, and customization in mind, this keyboard gives you the ultimate edge whether you’re gaming, streaming, or typing.

Immersive RGB Backlighting
Experience vibrant visuals with the K501 ASURA 2’s 7-color LED backlight, offering adjustable brightness and pulsing speed to match your gaming mood. Each key is equipped with clear, scratch-resistant lettering, ensuring that your keyboard looks sharp even after long-term use. Customize your setup with different backlight modes and enjoy a visually stunning gaming environment.

Responsive and Durable Keys
Featuring 104 standard ABS keycaps, this keyboard delivers medium resistance and tactile feedback for fast, accurate typing and gaming. The interchangeable arrow and WASD keys and the ability to disable the WIN key during intense sessions provide ultimate control, helping you avoid accidental interruptions. Its sturdy construction is built to withstand long hours of gameplay and heavy use.

Programmable Macros and Anti-Ghosting
Dominate your games with 8 programmable macro keys and 12 multimedia keys, giving you full command over your commands and shortcuts. The 32-key anti-ghosting technology ensures that every keystroke is registered, no matter how fast you type or how complex your combos are. Two macro playback speed options let you fine-tune your gaming performance effortlessly.

Ergonomic and Spill-Resistant Design
The Redragon K501 is not just a gaming tool—it’s comfortable for daily typing as well. Its ergonomic design with an integrated wrist rest reduces fatigue during long sessions, while the adjustable rear feet let you find your perfect typing angle. Built with a splash-resistant design, this keyboard can handle minor spills without affecting performance, ensuring reliability in any situation.

Seamless Compatibility
The K501 ASURA 2 works flawlessly with Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista, and XP, with limited support for Mac OS. A 6ft nylon braided USB cable with a corrosion-resistant connector ensures a fast and stable connection for uninterrupted gaming.

Specifications at a Glance:

  • 7-color LED backlighting with adjustable brightness

  • 104 standard keys with tactile feedback

  • 8 programmable macro keys and 12 multimedia keys

  • 32 conflict-free anti-ghosting keys

  • Interchangeable WASD and arrow keys, WIN key can be disabled

  • Splash-resistant and ergonomically designed

  • Integrated wrist rest and adjustable rear feet

  • 6ft high-speed USB cable with corrosion-resistant connector

  • Product Dimensions: 19.7 x 8.3 x 1.2 inches

Whether you’re battling in MMO raids, competing in FPS tournaments, or simply enjoying a reliable typing experience, the Redragon K501 ASURA 2 Gaming Keyboard brings performance, style, and comfort together in one powerful package.

fields.product_name: Redragon GCP06 24-Pin ARGB Power Extension Cable
fields.short_description: Upgrade your PC's aesthetics and functionality with the Redragon GCP06 24PIN ARGB Lighting Extension Cable. Designed to illuminate your build with vibrant, customizable RGB lighting, this high-quality extension cable perfectly combines durability and style. Its 24-pin design ensures compatibility with a wide range of motherboards, while the premium materials provide stable and reliable power delivery. The ARGB lighting system supports synchronization with most motherboard RGB software, offering endless color and effect combinations to match your setup.
fields.description:
Transform your PC build into a stunning visual masterpiece with the Redragon GCP06 24-Pin ARGB Lighting Extension Cable — a premium power extension cable designed for both style and performance. Perfect for gamers, creators, and PC enthusiasts, this cable not only enhances your rig’s aesthetic but also ensures stable and efficient power delivery to your motherboard.

With its brilliant ARGB illumination, durable triple-layer construction, and seamless RGB synchronization, the Redragon GCP06 gives your setup a professional, clean, and visually captivating look.

⚡ Brilliant ARGB Lighting for Stunning Visuals

The Redragon GCP06 brings your build to life with vibrant, customizable ARGB lighting. Featuring an advanced lighting strip integrated along the 24-pin connector, this extension cable creates a striking glow that complements any PC setup.

Compatible with leading motherboard RGB software — including ASUS Aura Sync, MSI Mystic Light, ASRock Polychrome, and Gigabyte RGB Fusion — the GCP06 offers endless color options and dynamic lighting effects. From smooth gradients to pulsing rainbows, every illumination pattern can be tailored to match your rig’s personality.

Let your PC shine like never before with smooth, uniform lighting that elevates your entire system’s visual appeal.

🔋 High-Speed, Lossless Power Performance

Beyond aesthetics, the GCP06 is engineered for exceptional electrical performance. Featuring 163 strands of 0.08mm tinned copper wire wrapped in UL1015 18AWG soft copper, it ensures:

  • Superior conductivity for consistent power flow

  • Reduced electrical resistance for stable operation

  • Enhanced flexibility for easier cable management

Whether you’re powering high-performance GPUs, motherboards, or peripherals, this cable ensures lossless power delivery — keeping your system running efficiently and reliably under heavy loads.

🧵 Triple-Layer Sleeved Durability

Built to last, the Redragon GCP06 24-Pin Extension Cable features a three-layer construction for unmatched durability and style:

  1. Inner copper conductor for superior power flow

  2. High-density PET braided sleeve for strength and flexibility

  3. Transparent PVC outer coating for a sleek, futuristic appearance

This triple-layer design provides excellent heat resistance, prevents tangling, and keeps your cables looking clean and professional. Not only does it improve airflow within your case, but it also adds a refined finishing touch to your gaming PC.

🌈 Seamless ARGB Synchronization

Create a unified, dynamic lighting experience across all your components. The GCP06 ARGB cable syncs effortlessly with your existing ARGB setup, ensuring your entire rig pulses in harmony.

With full compatibility with 5V 3-pin ARGB headers, you can control color transitions, effects, and brightness levels using your motherboard’s native software. Enjoy smooth, consistent, and fully customizable lighting effects that adapt to your mood or game environment.

🧩 Conquer Cable Clutter

Cable management has never been easier. The GCP06 comes with durable cable combs, designed to keep your 24-pin wires neatly aligned and secure. These combs:

  • Maintain a clean, organized look

  • Improve airflow and cooling efficiency

  • Simplify installation and maintenance

Say goodbye to messy cables — and hello to a tidy, professional-looking PC interior that showcases both performance and precision.

🔧 Simple Installation, Flexible Fit

Installing the Redragon GCP06 is quick and hassle-free. Its flexible, soft copper wiring makes routing through tight spaces effortless, while its universal 24-pin design ensures compatibility with most modern ATX motherboards and PSUs.

No extra tools or complicated setups required — just plug in, sync your lighting, and watch your system come alive with color and energy.

🎮 Perfect for Gamers and PC Enthusiasts

Whether you’re customizing your dream rig or upgrading your existing build, the Redragon GCP06 24-Pin ARGB Cable is the perfect finishing touch. Designed for gamers, modders, and performance enthusiasts, it delivers both beauty and efficiency in one sleek package.

It’s the ideal choice for anyone who wants to:

  • Add a premium RGB aesthetic to their build

  • Improve power stability and cable organization

  • Achieve a clean, professional, and high-performance system look

With the GCP06, you don’t just power your PC — you illuminate your creativity.

🧠 Key Features at a Glance

  • Model: Redragon GCP06

  • Type: 24-Pin ARGB Lighting Extension Cable

  • Lighting: Addressable RGB (5V 3-Pin)

  • Synchronization: Compatible with ASUS Aura, MSI Mystic Light, Gigabyte RGB Fusion, ASRock Polychrome

  • Material: 163 strands of 0.08mm tinned copper, UL1015 18AWG wire

  • Build: Triple-layer sleeved (PET + PVC)

  • Length: Ideal for full-sized ATX builds

  • Accessories: Includes cable combs for easy management

  • Performance: Lossless power delivery and optimal conductivity

🌟 Why Choose the Redragon GCP06?

The Redragon GCP06 ARGB 24-Pin Cable delivers more than just light — it brings your entire build together. It’s durable, efficient, and visually stunning, designed to satisfy both aesthetic perfectionists and performance enthusiasts.

With superior electrical stability, high-quality materials, and synchronized ARGB brilliance, it’s a small upgrade that makes a massive visual impact.
Upgrade your power. Upgrade your glow. Upgrade your rig with the Redragon GCP06.

Bring style, silence, and superior cooling to your PC with the Redragon CCW-3011 White ARGB Dual 120mm Liquid CPU Cooler — a perfect combination of performance, beauty, and efficiency for modern gaming and professional systems. Whether you’re building a clean white-themed rig or upgrading for better thermals, this liquid cooler ensures your CPU stays cool even during the most demanding workloads.

💧 Premium Cooling for High-Performance Systems

The Redragon CCW-3011W is built with advanced copper heat pipes and a high-efficiency water block to deliver exceptional cooling power. Its dual 120mm fans provide optimized airflow across a 240mm radiator, ensuring rapid heat dissipation for both gaming and productivity tasks.

With a high TDP capacity of up to 350W, this cooler handles high-end CPUs effortlessly — perfect for gamers, streamers, and creators who push their systems to the limit.

🔇 Whisper-Quiet Operation

Enjoy top-tier cooling performance without the noise. The low-noise pump block ensures smooth liquid circulation, reducing vibrations and maintaining silent operation even under heavy loads. This makes the CCW-3011 ideal for users who want quiet performance while editing, designing, or gaming for long hours.

🌈 Customizable ARGB Lighting

Personalize your setup with stunning ARGB lighting effects that sync beautifully with your PC components. The addressable RGB system lets you match colors and patterns with your motherboard or other peripherals — turning your rig into a true visual masterpiece.

Whether you prefer subtle white illumination or vibrant RGB transitions, the CCW-3011 White makes your build stand out in style.

⚙️ Efficient Design & Broad Compatibility

Designed for simplicity and durability, the Redragon CCW-3011 features a compact 240mm radiator (276 x 120 x 27 mm) that fits in most PC cases. Despite its slim profile, it delivers impressive cooling efficiency.

It’s also compatible with a wide range of sockets, including the latest AMD AM series and Intel LGA platforms, ensuring easy installation across multiple systems.

🧊 Key Features:

  • Dual 120mm ARGB Fans – Exceptional cooling performance and visual flair.

  • Low-Noise Pump Block – Efficient and quiet operation for long sessions.

  • Customizable RGB Lighting – Match your PC’s theme with vivid lighting.

  • Wide Socket Support – Works with both AMD and Intel processors.

  • High TDP Cooling (Up to 350W) – Ideal for gaming and high-performance builds.

  • Compact Radiator Size (276 × 120 × 27 mm) – Fits most mid-tower and full-tower cases.

🎮 Perfect for Gamers & Creators

If you demand power and aesthetics, the Redragon CCW-3011 White ARGB Liquid Cooler is built for you. It keeps your CPU temperatures low during intense gaming, streaming, and creative workloads — all while adding a clean, elegant touch to your setup.

Whether you’re chasing better overclocking performance or a silent workspace, the CCW-3011 gives you both — performance meets perfection.

fields.product_name: Redragon K513 ADITYA RGB Gaming Keyboard
fields.short_description: Multimedia keys 5 Extra On-Board Macro G Keys Dedicated Media Control Solid Metal Top Case 26 Anti-ghost Keys Full dynamic RGB backlighting Pro Software Standby
fields.description:
Step into the world of immersive gaming with the Redragon K513 ADITYA RGB Membrane Gaming Keyboard, a perfect blend of performance, style, and reliability. Designed for both new and seasoned gamers, this keyboard delivers smooth, responsive keystrokes and versatile customization options to elevate your gaming experience.

Classic Full-Size Layout with Mechanical-Feel
The K513 ADITYA features a standard 104-key layout with mechanical-feel membrane switches, offering a linear, smooth, and satisfying typing experience. Whether you’re gaming or working, every keypress feels precise and responsive, making it an ideal choice for entry-level and mid-tier gamers alike.

Programmable Macro Keys for Advanced Gaming
Take control of your gameplay with 5 on-board G keys (G1~G5). These programmable macro keys allow you to execute complex commands on the fly without any additional software. From rapid skill combos to custom shortcuts, these keys give you an edge in fast-paced gaming situations.

Convenient Media Controls
The keyboard includes 4 dedicated media keys on the top-right corner for quick access to playback, pause, next/previous track, and stop functions. Manage your music or media without interrupting your game or workflow.

Anti-Ghosting for Accurate Performance
With 26 anti-ghost keys, you can press multiple keys simultaneously, ensuring that every input registers accurately. This is perfect for executing complex combos, skills, or fast-paced sequences without missing a beat.

Vibrant RGB Backlighting
The true RGB backlight brings your keyboard to life with customizable lighting effects. Choose from 6 preset modes or create your own dynamic patterns to match your gaming setup. With Redragon’s professional software, you can explore even more immersive lighting and macro options.

Durable and Stylish Design
Built with a solid metal top case, the K513 ADITYA is designed to withstand intense gaming sessions while maintaining a premium look. Its sturdy construction ensures long-lasting durability, combining both style and function.

Specifications at a Glance:

  • Standard 104-key layout with mechanical-feel membrane switches

  • 5 programmable on-board macro G keys (G1~G5)

  • 4 dedicated media keys for easy control

  • 26 anti-ghost keys for accurate simultaneous keypresses

  • True RGB backlighting with 6 preset modes and customizable options

  • Solid metal top case for durability

  • Professional software support for lighting and macro customization

Whether you’re starting your gaming journey or upgrading your setup, the Redragon K513 ADITYA RGB Gaming Keyboard delivers precision, style, and comfort in every keystroke.

This wired optical mouse combines customizable performance with an ergonomic design to keep you in command during intense gaming or long work sessions.

Adjustable DPI for Precision Control
The Tiger 2 offers 4 on-the-fly adjustable DPI levels—800, 1600, 2400, and 3200—allowing you to switch DPI effortlessly for precise aiming or fast navigation. You can also fine-tune DPI settings through software in ±400 increments between 800–3200 DPI, giving you complete control over sensitivity.

Customizable Buttons & Macros
Equipped with 6 programmable buttons, including 2 side macro buttons, this mouse lets you map tactical keybinds, shortcuts, or in-game macros for optimal efficiency. Adapt the mouse to your style and gain an advantage in any game.

Ergonomic Comfort & Grip
The claw-grip design combined with a skin-friendly frosted coating provides a secure and comfortable hold, reducing fatigue during extended use. A rougher texture on the left side enhances friction, giving you better control and precision.

Redragon Themed Backlit
The mouse features a stylish red backlight, perfectly matching Redragon-themed setups. Its sleek design adds flair to your gaming station while keeping your focus on the battlefield.

Durable & Reliable Performance
Built with a solid frame and high-quality optical sensor, the Tiger 2 ensures accurate tracking, fast response times, and long-lasting durability. The 1000 Hz polling rate ensures smooth and precise movements during fast-paced gaming.

Key Features:

  • DPI: 800 / 1600 / 2400 / 3200 adjustable

  • Buttons: 6 total (5 programmable including 2 side buttons)

  • Tracking System: Optical

  • Ergonomic Design: Claw-grip with skin-friendly frosted coating

Package Includes:

High-Precision Performance

fields.description:
Optimize your compact PC build with the Boost Arctic CPU Cooler, a high-performance 90mm fan designed for small spaces, low-profile CPU coolers, or as an auxiliary case fan. This fan delivers reliable cooling without taking up the space of standard 120mm models, making it perfect for compact systems and tight enclosures.

Powerful Cooling Performance
The Boost Arctic fan operates at a fixed 2100 RPM, providing consistent airflow to keep your components cool under load. With an airflow of 45 CFM ±10%, it efficiently moves air to dissipate heat and maintain stable operating temperatures, ensuring your CPU and other components perform optimally even in high-demand scenarios.

Quiet and Durable Design
Equipped with a Hydraulic Bearing, the fan minimizes friction for smooth, quiet operation. This not only reduces noise compared to traditional sleeve-bearing fans but also enhances longevity, giving you a reliable cooling solution that lasts.

Simple Connectivity and Steady Color Lighting
Featuring a 3-Pin Steady Color Fan Connector, this fan provides easy installation and stable power delivery. The “Steady Color” design offers a clean, consistent lighting look or a simple non-RGB option, making it ideal for builds where subtlety and reliability are preferred over complex lighting setups.

Whether you’re upgrading a compact system or adding auxiliary cooling, the Boost Arctic 90mm CPU Cooler Fan provides efficient airflow, quiet operation, and reliable performance in a space-conscious design.

fields.short_description: Experience next-level precision with the MSI FORCE GC200 Gamepad (White) — a premium wired gaming controller built for smooth, responsive gameplay. Designed for PC and Android, it features Hall-Effect triggers, dual vibration motors, and ergonomic diamond-grip design for perfect control and comfort in every match.
fields.description:
Elevate your gaming experience with the MSI FORCE GC200 White Gamepad, a wired controller designed for precision, comfort, and professional-grade performance. Perfect for PC and Android gamers, this gamepad delivers responsive controls, immersive feedback, and long-lasting durability — all wrapped in a sleek, modern white finish that complements any setup.

Magnetic Hall-Effect Triggers for Pinpoint Accuracy
The GC200 features Hall-Effect magnetic sensors, replacing traditional mechanical triggers for ultra-smooth, drift-free input. Every acceleration, brake, or shot feels natural and precise, giving you a competitive edge in racing, FPS, and action games.

Responsive Analog Sticks for Seamless Control
Enjoy smooth and accurate movement with premium analog sticks. From quick camera adjustments to precise aiming, the GC200 ensures every action translates perfectly on-screen, keeping you in full control.

Dual Vibration Motors for Realistic Gameplay
Immerse yourself in the game with dual vibration motors. Explosions, collisions, and weapon recoil come alive through tactile feedback, making every gaming moment more engaging and thrilling.

Ergonomic Grip with Diamond Texture
Designed for comfort and control, the GC200’s ergonomic grip and anti-slip diamond texture let you play for hours without fatigue. Stay focused on the game, not on adjusting your hands.

Durable Buttons Built to Last
With millions of press cycles, the main action buttons are engineered for longevity. This gamepad is built to withstand intense gaming sessions, ensuring reliability for years to come.

Plug-and-Play Wired Connectivity
Experience zero-latency gameplay with a wired USB connection. Simply plug the GC200 into your PC or Android device and start playing immediately — no drivers, no delays.

Stylish White Design
Its clean white finish is both modern and versatile, seamlessly blending with white setups or RGB-lit environments. Minimalistic yet striking, the GC200 makes a statement in any gaming setup.

Why Choose MSI FORCE GC200 (White)?

  • Dual vibration motors for immersive gaming.

Whether you’re drifting through corners in racing games, firing precise shots in FPS titles, or exploring vast RPG worlds, the MSI FORCE GC200 White Gamepad gives you the comfort, durability, and precision to perform at your best.

Boost Hydera Pro 360mm Liquid Cooler
Boost Hydera Pro 360mm Liquid CPU Cooler - ARGB
fields.short_description:
• Fan Connector: PWM + ARGB
Features a PWM + ARGB fan connector for precise speed control and customizable lighting effects.
Fan Speed: 1800 ± 200 RPM
Delivers a fan speed of 1800 ±200 RPM for efficient cooling performance.

Offers a maximum airflow of 79.83 CFM for superior cooling efficiency.

Equipped with a 3-pin + ARGB pump connector for reliable operation and customizable lighting.
• Pump Speed: 2500 RPM ± 10%
Operates at a pump speed of 2500 RPM ± 10% for consistent and efficient liquid circulation
fields.description:
Take your high-performance gaming or workstation build to the next level with the Boost Hydera Pro 360mm Liquid Cooler. Designed for enthusiasts and power users, this cooler combines exceptional thermal efficiency, precise control, and customizable ARGB lighting to deliver both performance and style.

Dynamic Cooling Fan Performance
Equipped with a high-capacity radiator fan, the Boost Hydera Pro ensures efficient heat dissipation from your CPU. The fan supports PWM (Pulse Width Modulation), allowing your motherboard or software to automatically adjust fan speed based on CPU temperature. This means quieter operation during light loads and maximum cooling when your system is under stress.

The fan also features ARGB (Addressable RGB) lighting, letting you synchronize colors and effects with other ARGB components in your build for a stunning visual setup. Operating at 1800±200 RPM, the fan pushes a substantial 79.83 CFM airflow, ensuring rapid heat removal from the radiator fins for reliable performance under heavy workloads.

Robust and Controllable Pump System
At the heart of the cooler is a high-speed pump, delivering consistent liquid circulation throughout the cooling loop. The pump runs at 2500 RPM ±10%, maximizing heat transfer from the CPU to the radiator. It also features a 3-Pin + ARGB connector, providing stable power and customizable lighting to match your system’s theme.

Sleek Integration and Customization
With its combination of high-capacity airflow, efficient fluid dynamics, and software-controlled operation, the Boost Hydera Pro 360mm Liquid Cooler delivers both powerful performance and aesthetic appeal. Its ARGB lighting ensures your build looks as good as it performs, making it a perfect choice for gamers, creators, and PC enthusiasts who demand the best.

fields.product_name: Redragon M908 IMPACT 12400 DPI 18-Button Gaming Mouse
fields.short_description: 12400 DPI, 18 Programable Buttons, 5 Memory Modes, 16M Colour Backlight
fields.description:
Take your MMO and MOBA gaming to the next level with the Redragon M908 IMPACT Gaming Mouse, a precision-crafted weapon designed for professional gamers and enthusiasts alike. With 12400 DPI, 18 programmable buttons, and fully customizable RGB lighting, this mouse is optimized for rapid response, comfort, and ultimate control.

Specialized for MMO & MOBA Games
The M908 isn’t just another gaming mouse—it’s engineered for genres that demand speed and precision. With 12 side buttons, full pinky and ring finger support, and smooth Teflon skates, you’ll execute complex combos effortlessly while maintaining full control. Its high-precision Pixart PAW3327 sensor, 30G acceleration, and 1000 Hz polling rate give you a real competitive edge.

Customizable DPI & Rapid Response
Adapt your mouse sensitivity on the fly with five preset DPI levels (500, 1000, 2000, 3000, 6200) or fine-tune freely from 100 to 12400 DPI using the dedicated software. A rapid-fire button ensures one click can fire three bursts instantly, giving you a tactical advantage when timing is critical.

RGB Lighting & Programmable Profiles
Immerse yourself in your gaming setup with 16.8 million RGB color options. Assign colors to five memory profiles for quick identification. Every one of the 18 buttons is fully programmable, and the 8-piece weight tuning system lets you customize the feel of the mouse to match your style. Four DPI indicator LEDs and dynamic lighting effects provide instant visual feedback during gameplay.

Ergonomic & Durable Design
The M908 IMPACT features an ergonomic shape designed for long gaming sessions, reducing fatigue and keeping you focused. A 6-foot braided USB cable with a gold-plated connector ensures durability and reliable connectivity, while Teflon foot pads deliver ultra-smooth movement across any surface.

Professional Software for Total Control
With the included software, you can customize lighting, DPI, macros, and multi-key combinations. Whether you’re aiming, slicing, or performing complex MMO actions, the M908 ensures every command is executed precisely and efficiently.

Wide Compatibility
Compatible with Windows 2000, ME, XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 and Mac OS, the M908 IMPACT Gaming Mouse is perfect for both everyday use and professional gaming setups.

FAQs:

  • Q: Is Redragon M908 good for FPS and MMO games?
    A: Yes, it’s designed for MMO but also excels in FPS due to high DPI and customizable buttons.

  • Q: How many programmable buttons does it have?
    A: The mouse has 18 programmable buttons, ideal for MMO gamers.

  • Q: Does it work on Mac?
    A: Yes, it supports both Windows and Mac OS.

  • Q: What is the warranty?
    A: All products purchased from Redragon Pakistan come with warranty.

  • Q: Is Cash on Delivery available?
    A: Yes, delivery with COD option is available across Pakistan.

Key Features:

  • DPI adjustable from 100 to 12400 (±100 increments)

  • 18 programmable buttons including 12 MMO side buttons

  • Rapid-fire pre-configured button for burst attacks

  • 16.8 Million RGB LED colors & 5 memory profiles

  • Adjustable weight system for customized feel

  • High-precision Pixart PAW3327 optical sensor

  • Ergonomic design for extended gaming sessions

  • Durable braided 1.8m USB cable with gold-plated connector

  • Smooth Teflon foot pads for seamless gliding

  • Compatible with Windows and Mac OS

The Redragon M908 IMPACT Gaming Mouse is your ultimate weapon for precision, speed, and performance. Conquer your games, execute combos effortlessly, and game in style with unmatched comfort.

Compatible with both Windows and macOS, it fits seamlessly into any setup, whether you’re a gamer, streamer, or creative professional.

The aluminum alloy connectors add an extra layer of strength and heat resistance, ensuring long-lasting reliability even under heavy use. It’s designed to withstand thousands of bends — making it a dependable companion for everyday charging.

The tangle-free braided exterior ensures that it coils neatly every time, saving you time and space.

fields.product_name: Redragon M913 IMPACT ELITE Wireless Gaming Mouse
fields.short_description: Wireless Gaming Mouse, 16000 DPI Wired/Wireless RGB Gamer Mouse with 16 Programmable Buttons
fields.description:
Dominate your games with the Redragon M913 IMPACT ELITE Wireless Gaming Mouse, engineered for both speed and precision. Designed for MMO and esports enthusiasts, this versatile gaming mouse features dual-mode wired/wireless connectivity, ultra-responsive controls, and full RGB customization.

Dual-Mode Connectivity – Wired & Wireless
Whether you prefer 2.4GHz wireless freedom or a USB-C wired connection, the M913 keeps you in the game with low-latency performance. Combine this with 12 MMO side buttons and easy-access keybinding shortcuts for maximum control in intense battles.

Ultra-Fast Response
Powered by the Pixart 3335 optical gaming sensor, every click and swipe is registered within 1ms, giving you unmatched speed, accuracy, and efficiency. Low-latency performance ensures your actions always land first.

Long-Lasting Power
Equipped with a 1000mAh rechargeable battery and an advanced low-consumption chip, the M913 can last through long gaming sessions. Enable Eco mode with RGB off to extend battery life up to 80 hours.

Esports-Ready DPI Options
Switch effortlessly between 5 onboard DPI levels (1000/2000/4000/8000/16000) to match your gameplay style. Personalize DPI ±100 to achieve the perfect sensitivity, whether for precision sniping or fast-paced battles.

RGB Backlighting & Customization
The M913 IMPACT ELITE features vibrant RGB backlighting, fully customizable through Redragon software. Assign macros, adjust lighting effects, and create a mouse setup tailored to your gaming preferences.

Specifications:

  • Sensor: Pixart 3335 Optical

  • DPI: 1000 / 2000 / 4000 / 8000 / 16000 (adjustable ±100)

  • Buttons: 16 programmable buttons

  • Connectivity: 2.4GHz wireless & USB-C wired

  • Polling Rate: 1000Hz

  • Response Time: 1ms

  • Compatibility: Windows 2000/ME/XP/03/VISTA/7/8/10; Mac OS (basic functions)

Why Choose the M913 IMPACT ELITE?
Whether you’re MMO grinding, FPS sniping, or just looking for a reliable high-performance mouse, the Redragon M913 gives you precision, speed, and ultimate comfort. Its dual-mode design and customizable buttons make it a must-have for serious gamers.

fields.description:
Experience high-performance cooling and stunning aesthetics with the Boost Hydera Pro 240mm Liquid Cooler, designed for gamers, creators, and professionals who demand optimal thermal management and customizable visuals.

Powerful Fan Performance
The cooler comes with a high-efficiency fan featuring PWM + ARGB connectivity, offering precise control and dazzling lighting effects. With PWM (Pulse Width Modulation), the fan speed dynamically adjusts according to CPU temperature, ensuring quiet operation during light workloads and maximum cooling when under heavy load.

The ARGB (Addressable RGB) capability allows for synchronized, customizable lighting that matches your build’s style. Operating at 1800±200 RPM, the fan delivers a strong 79.83 CFM airflow, quickly dissipating heat from the radiator to maintain low CPU temperatures, even during intense gaming or heavy multitasking.

Reliable Pump Performance
At the heart of this liquid cooling system is a powerful pump with 3-Pin + ARGB connectivity, providing stable operation and integrated lighting customization. Running at a consistent 2500 RPM ±10%, the pump ensures efficient liquid circulation throughout the loop, optimizing heat transfer from the CPU cold plate to the radiator for maximum performance and longevity.

Aesthetic and Functional Integration
With its combination of high-speed fan and pump, full PWM control, and fully customizable ARGB lighting, the Boost Hydera Pro 240mm Liquid Cooler seamlessly blends performance with visual appeal. It’s an ideal solution for compact or mid-sized cases, delivering top-tier cooling efficiency and a sleek, illuminated design that complements any high-performance PC build.

fields.description:
Upgrade your gaming setup with the Redragon K530W RGB Draconic Wireless Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, designed for ultimate performance, portability, and style. Engineered with professional FPS gamers and productivity enthusiasts in mind, this compact 61-key tenkeyless (TKL) keyboard combines precision, speed, and wireless freedom.

Compact, Portable, and Efficient
The 61-key layout frees up valuable desk space, allowing smoother mouse movement and faster access to essential keys. Its ultra-minimalistic design ensures portability, making it perfect for gamers who need a clean and efficient setup.

Wireless Freedom with Dual Modes
Equipped with Bluetooth 5.0 and a 2400 mAh long-lasting battery, the K530W can connect to PCs, tablets, and smartphones simultaneously without cables. For added reliability, the keyboard features a wired/wireless mode switch, giving you a “Plan B” option to avoid any concerns about wireless lag.

Red Mechanical Switches for Precision
The Redragon Red switches provide a soft, smooth feel, registering inputs with minimal noise and maximum responsiveness. Rated for 50 million keypresses, these switches deliver durability and consistency, ideal for both gaming marathons and office work.

Customizable RGB Lighting
Bring your setup to life with 13 dynamic preset illumination modes and millions of color options. Reactive typing effects allow you to create personalized lighting patterns without the need for additional software, making your keyboard truly your own.

Durable and Reliable Design
Crafted with high-quality materials, the K530W ensures long-lasting performance even during intense gaming sessions. Its detachable Type-C cable, adjustable height, and sturdy construction make it a reliable choice for competitive and casual gamers alike.

Tech Specs at a Glance:

  • Keyboard Weight: 0.8 kg

  • Keyboard Dimensions: 291.7 x 101.7 x 36 mm

  • Key Switches: Redragon Mechanical Red Switches (50 million keystrokes)

  • Matrix: 61 Keys (Full N-Key Rollover)

  • Height Adjustable: Yes

  • Layout: Tenkeyless (TKL)

fields.description:
Step into console-style gaming on your PC with the Redragon G807 Saturn Gamepad. Designed for PC and PS3 gamers, this controller delivers precise control, dual vibration feedback, and a familiar layout that makes gaming more immersive and enjoyable. Whether you’re tackling modern PC titles or revisiting older classics, the G807 Saturn has the versatility to keep you in control.

Plug-and-Play Convenience
No complex setup needed — simply plug the controller into your PC or PS3, and start playing. Compatible with PC games supporting Xinput mode, it’s ready for hundreds of popular titles right out of the box.

Dual Vibration Feedback
Feel every in-game collision, explosion, or action through the dual vibration motors, enhancing your immersion and making gameplay more realistic.

Multi-Mode Compatibility
Switch easily between Xinput and DirectInput modes to enjoy both modern and older PC games. This flexibility ensures that even pre-Xinput titles can be played without compromise.

Ergonomic Design for Comfortable Gaming
The G807 Saturn features a console-style layout, 4-way D-pad, two analog sticks, and 12 responsive action buttons. Its ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip during extended gaming sessions.

  • Supports hundreds of PC games

fields.description:

Designed for Android, iOS, smart TVs, set-top boxes, and PS4 streaming, this all-in-one controller gives you seamless connectivity, precise control, and a comfortable design for hours of play. Whether you’re exploring mobile games, streaming your console, or gaming on a TV, the CERES controller adapts to your needs.

Four-in-One Functionality
The CERES gamepad supports multiple modes, giving you maximum flexibility:

  • iOS Standard Mode: Connect instantly without third-party platforms, compatible with over 800 games downloaded from the App Store.

  • Android Mode: Supports most Android games and platforms, including Octopus Game, and automatically recognizes Android HID mode.

Easy Phone Pairing & Connectivity
Pairing is simple and intuitive:

  • Power On/Off: Press the HOME button for 3 seconds to power on/off.

  • Bluetooth Pairing: Search for the Bluetooth ID “A23” on your device and connect instantly.

  • Indicator Lights & Modes: Easily track connection status and switch between modes.

Sleep & Energy-Saving Features

  • Automatically turns off after 30 seconds of inactivity when disconnected.

  • Enters sleep mode after 5 minutes of no operation.

Why Choose Redragon G812 CERES?

  • Four-in-one function for iOS, Android, Smart TV, and PS4 streaming.

  • Supports more than 800 iOS games and most Android games.

  • Easy Bluetooth pairing and intuitive LED indicators.

  • Automatic sleep mode conserves battery during idle times.

  • Comfortable ergonomic design for extended gaming sessions.

Whether you’re a mobile gamer, console streamer, or smart TV enthusiast, the Redragon G812 CERES Wireless Gamepad offers unmatched versatility, reliable connectivity, and precision control for every gaming scenario. Its multi-platform compatibility ensures you can enjoy gaming anytime, anywhere.

  • 4Xø6MM heat pipes

fields.description:
Upgrade your PC’s cooling with the Redragon CC-1013 ARGB Cooler, designed to deliver superior thermal performance, precise airflow control, and stunning ARGB lighting for an optimized gaming and productivity experience. Built for enthusiasts and professionals alike, this cooler ensures your CPU stays cool even under intense workloads.

Superior Thermal Performance
The Redragon CC-1013 features a robust copper heatpipe design with 4 x 6mm heat pipes that make direct contact with your CPU. This efficient heat transfer quickly wicks heat away from the processor and disperses it across the large aluminum fin stack. Whether you’re gaming, streaming, or handling demanding software, your CPU maintains optimal temperatures for stable performance.

Precise Airflow and Intelligent Control
Equipped with a 120mm ARGB PWM fan, this cooler balances high airflow with quiet operation. With speeds ranging from 800 to 1800±10% RPM, the fan automatically adjusts based on your CPU temperature, providing silent performance during light tasks and maximum cooling when needed. Delivering a powerful 72.6 CFM airflow, it ensures heat is effectively moved away from the CPU. The ARGB lighting adds customizable illumination, letting you sync the cooler with your build’s aesthetics for a visually stunning setup.

Integrated Digital Monitoring
Stay informed about your CPU’s performance with the built-in digital display, showing real-time temperature readings directly on the cooler. No extra software needed—just glance at the display and monitor your system’s thermal status instantly.

Broad Compatibility
The Redragon CC-1013 is designed for maximum versatility:

  • Intel: LGA 1700, LGA 1200, LGA 115X, LGA 1366

  • AMD: AM5, AM4

This wide support ensures seamless integration with almost any modern Intel or AMD processor, making it ideal for new builds or system upgrades.

Enhance your PC’s cooling, enjoy quiet operation, and showcase stunning ARGB lighting with the Redragon CC-1013 ARGB Cooler—a perfect combination of performance and style.

fields.description:
Bring professional lighting and modern elegance to your workspace with the Redragon GML-113 BERYL Monitor Light, a premium E-Reading LED Screen Bar designed to reduce eye strain and create a perfectly lit environment for work, study, or gaming. Crafted from durable aluminum alloy, this sleek light bar delivers focused illumination, adjustable color temperature, and smart touch controls — making it a must-have upgrade for every setup.

Whether you’re burning the midnight oil or diving into long gaming sessions, the BERYL Monitor Light ensures eye comfort, style, and efficiency in one minimalist package.

💡 No Screen Glare – Just Pure, Focused Light

Say goodbye to annoying reflections and harsh brightness. The Redragon GML-113 features an asymmetrical optical design that directs light forward onto your desk — not your screen. This intelligent lighting eliminates screen glare and reflection, reducing eye fatigue caused by prolonged screen exposure.

Perfect for programmers, designers, writers, and gamers, it delivers consistent, soft illumination exactly where you need it, enhancing focus and comfort during long hours at your monitor.

🌈 Adjustable Hue & 10 Brightness Levels

Customize your lighting with precision control. The Redragon BERYL Monitor Light offers:

  • 6 color temperature modes (ranging from 3000K – 6000K)

  • 10 adjustable brightness levels

  • Touch-sensitive controls for quick and easy adjustment

Switch to cool white light to stay alert and focused during work hours, or choose warm yellow tones for a relaxing, cozy atmosphere while reading or streaming. With every level adjustable by 500K increments, you have full control over your lighting environment — whether for productivity or comfort.

⚙️ Simple & Secure Installation

The GML-113 BERYL is designed for effortless setup on almost any monitor type — from ultra-thin displays to standard flat screens.

  • Compatible monitor thickness: 0.4" to 1.2"

  • No tools or screws required

  • Just clip it onto the top edge of your monitor, plug it in, and tap the power button to illuminate your workspace instantly.

Its balanced weight design keeps it firmly in place without damaging your screen, providing both stability and style.

🧱 Premium Aluminum Build – Sleek and Durable

Made from high-quality aluminum alloy, the Redragon GML-113 not only looks elegant but also offers long-lasting durability. The aluminum frame acts as a natural heat dissipator, keeping the light cool even after hours of use.

Its minimalist design complements any setup — whether it’s a gaming rig, office workstation, or creative studio. The BERYL’s clean matte finish gives your desk an upgraded, professional aesthetic that perfectly matches modern tech environments.

👀 Protect Your Eyes During Long Sessions

Extended screen time can lead to headaches, eye strain, and fatigue. The Redragon GML-113 is built with eye-care LED technology that delivers flicker-free, soft, and evenly distributed light.

This reduces blue light exposure, ensuring your eyes stay relaxed even after hours of intense focus — ideal for:

  • Gamers playing through long sessions

  • Students studying at night

  • Professionals working under tight deadlines

With this light bar, your monitor becomes a productivity tool that’s as comfortable as it is functional.

🎮 Designed for Gamers, Loved by Professionals

The BERYL Monitor Light isn’t just functional — it’s immersive. The customizable hues and brightness settings let you create a lighting mood that matches your activity. Need a calm, dim glow for late-night gaming? Or bright, crisp light for document editing? You’re in full control.

Its modern, minimal form factor also helps free up valuable desk space compared to traditional desk lamps — leaving room for your keyboard, mouse, and accessories.

🌟 Key Features:

  • Model: Redragon GML-113 BERYL

  • Type: Monitor Light / LED Screen Bar

  • Material: Aluminum Alloy

  • Lighting: 6 Color Temperature Levels (3000K – 6000K)

  • Brightness: 10 Adjustable Levels

  • Controls: Touch-sensitive panel for on/off, brightness, and hue

  • Mounting Compatibility: 0.4"–1.2" screen thickness

  • Optical Design: Asymmetrical light projection (no screen glare)

  • Color Options: Warm / Cool light

  • Ideal For: Work, Study, Gaming, and E-Reading

💬 Why Choose the Redragon GML-113 BERYL?

If you’re looking to improve your workspace lighting, eye comfort, and aesthetics, the Redragon BERYL Monitor Light is the perfect choice. It combines elegant design with smart functionality — reducing eye fatigue while giving your setup a refined, futuristic look.

Whether you’re an office professional or a late-night gamer, the GML-113 offers the perfect lighting balance to help you perform at your best, stay focused longer, and work more comfortably.

Upgrade your desk. Protect your eyes. Light your world — with Redragon BERYL.

fields.description:
Elevate your gaming experience with the Redragon G809 Jupiter Wireless Gamepad, a dual-platform controller compatible with both Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4 (PS4). Designed for comfort, precision, and immersive gameplay, this controller combines advanced features like a touchpad, six-axis sensor, RGB LED indicators, and built-in audio for the ultimate gaming experience.

Two-in-One Compatibility
Whether you’re gaming on a PS4, PS4 Slim, PS4 Pro, or a Nintendo Switch, the G809 Jupiter has you covered. Equipped with a six-axis sensor and dual-point capacitive touchpad, it delivers responsive control for a variety of gaming scenarios, from fast-paced shooters to intricate platformers.

Advanced Design for Enhanced Interaction
Revolutionary features like the integrated touchpad, mini light bar, and built-in speaker allow you to experience games in a whole new way. The 3.5mm audio jack provides a personal audio solution, perfect for private listening during intense gaming sessions.

Double Vibration Feedback
Feel the action with dual vibration motors that dynamically adjust according to in-game events. Every crash, explosion, and action is translated into tactile feedback, immersing you deeper into the gameplay.

Precision Control
Ergonomically designed for comfort and extended play, the G809 Jupiter’s dual analog sticks, trigger buttons, and tactile keys offer absolute control. Every movement, click, and action is executed with perfect accuracy, making it ideal for both casual and competitive gamers.

Colorful LED Display
Stay informed with a mini LED light bar that changes colors to indicate charging, connection status, and player identification. Easily turn the LEDs on or off with a simple button combination (LB+RB for 5 seconds).

Key Features:

  • RGB LED color channel instructions

  • Dual-point capacitive sensing touchpad

  • Double motor vibration for immersive feedback

  • Six-axis motion sensor for precision control

  • Share, Option, XYAB, LT/RT/LB/RB buttons, Home button, and dual 360° joysticks

  • 3.5mm headset jack with built-in speaker

  • Compatible with both PS4 and Nintendo Switch

Specifications:

  • Product Size: 6.3 x 4.1 x 2.3 inches (160 x 103 x 58mm)

  • Weight: 196g ±10g

  • Connection: Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR

  • Effective Distance: ≥10m

  • Battery: 850mA rechargeable Lithium Polymer

  • Working Time: 6-7 hours

  • Charging Time: 2 hours via Micro USB

  • Sensor: Six-axis function

  • Vibration: Dual vibration motors

  • Mic/Headset: 3.5mm TRRS stereo, supports mic & headset

The Redragon G809 Jupiter Wireless Gamepad is perfect for gamers who want a stylish, high-performance controller that works across multiple platforms. Its premium design, advanced features, and responsive controls make every gaming session more enjoyable and competitive.

The M910 RANGER CHROMA is equipped with a Pixart P3327 optical sensor, offering up to 12400 DPI for lethal accuracy. Programmable Buttons & Customization
With 9 programmable buttons and 5 memory modes, you can assign macros, key combinations, and custom commands for enhanced gameplay efficiency. The professional software allows customization of DPI, polling rate (125Hz/250Hz/500Hz/1000Hz), and Mouse Point Speed for precision tailored to your style.

fields.product_name: Redragon CC-2000 EFFECT RGB CPU Air Cooler
fields.short_description: 4 x ø6mm Copper heat-pipes120mm PWM RGB LED Fan Compatible with AMD Socket AM4/Intel LGA 115X
fields.description:
Experience the perfect blend of performance, style, and cooling efficiency with the Redragon CC-2000 EFFECT RGB CPU Air Cooler — a powerful and stylish cooling solution designed to keep your processor running at its best. Whether you’re a gamer pushing your rig to the limit or a professional relying on stable CPU performance, the CC-2000 delivers silent, efficient, and visually stunning cooling.

🔧 Efficient Cooling with Premium Build

Built with 4 high-quality Ø6mm copper heat pipes, this cooler ensures fast and even heat dissipation from your CPU. The copper base directly contacts the CPU surface, providing superior thermal conductivity and maintaining ideal temperatures even during heavy gaming or multitasking sessions.

The 120mm PWM RGB LED fan offers dynamic cooling performance while maintaining whisper-quiet operation. Its optimized fan blade design delivers strong airflow without excessive noise — ensuring your system stays cool and quiet under any load.

🌈 Vibrant RGB Illumination

A key highlight of the Redragon CC-2000 is its RGB LED lighting, which brings life to your gaming setup. The vivid, customizable lighting adds an aesthetic edge to your build — perfectly complementing RGB components like RAM, GPU, or motherboard lighting. Whether you prefer a static color or dynamic effects, the RGB visuals make your PC look as cool as it runs.

⚙️ Optimized Design for Stability and Longevity

The CC-2000’s durable construction ensures reliable long-term use. Each component, from the fan bearings to the heat-pipe structure, is designed for stability and consistent cooling efficiency. The PWM (Pulse Width Modulation) control dynamically adjusts fan speed according to CPU temperature, providing the ideal balance between silence and performance.

This advanced cooling design makes it ideal for users who demand reliability and smooth performance — without the risk of overheating or throttling.

💻 Broad Compatibility

Engineered for flexibility, the Redragon CC-2000 EFFECT RGB Air Cooler supports a wide range of platforms:

  • AMD: AM4 socket

  • Intel: LGA 115X series (1150 / 1151 / 1155 / 1156)

This broad compatibility ensures an easy installation process for most modern CPU sockets, making it a perfect fit for gaming PCs, workstation builds, and performance desktops.

🧊 Why Choose the Redragon CC-2000 EFFECT?

  • 4×Ø6mm Copper Heat Pipes for maximum thermal conductivity.

  • 120mm PWM RGB Fan for quiet and efficient cooling.

  • Stylish RGB Illumination for a premium look.

  • Compatible with both AMD and Intel platforms.

  • Built with Redragon’s trusted durability and design precision.

Whether you’re upgrading your existing PC or building a new system, the CC-2000 EFFECT ensures your CPU stays cool under pressure — all while enhancing your setup’s aesthetics.

AA-TIGER 580 RGB Heatsink - 6 Heatpipe CPU Cooler
fields.short_description:

Bearing: Hydraulic

fields.description:
Enhance your PC cooling with the AA-TIGER 580 RGB Heatsink, a high-performance CPU cooler designed for gamers, enthusiasts, and performance-focused builds. Featuring six copper heatpipes, a 120mm RGB fan, and versatile connectivity, it combines powerful cooling with striking visual customization.

Efficient Cooling and Performance
The AA-TIGER 580 comes with a 120 x 120 x 25mm fan equipped with six heatpipes, ensuring rapid heat transfer from the CPU to the heatsink fins. The fan operates at a variable speed of 800–2000+ RPM, generating an airflow of 55±10% CFM, effectively keeping your CPU cool even during heavy workloads. The Hydraulic Bearing design provides smooth, reliable, and quiet operation while extending the fan’s lifespan.

Quiet Operation and Durability
Despite its high airflow capacity, the fan maintains a low noise level of 24±10 dBA, delivering efficient cooling without distracting sound. With an impressive operating lifetime of 40,000 hours, the AA-TIGER 580 offers long-term reliability for your system.

Versatile Connectivity and RGB Customization
The cooler supports multiple power and control configurations:

  • Rated Voltage: DC 5V–12V

  • Rated Current: 0.25A

  • Power Input: 0.3W

It comes with versatile connectors, including 3-pin, 4-pin PWM, and 5V-3 pin + 4-pin ARGB connectors, ensuring compatibility with most motherboards. The 5V 3-pin ARGB connector allows full synchronization of the Infinity RGB lighting with your motherboard software, giving your PC a fully customizable and dynamic look.

AA-TIGER 580 RGB Heatsink delivers a balance of high cooling performance, quiet operation, and stunning RGB lighting, making it an ideal choice for gaming rigs, workstations, and custom builds seeking both performance and style.

fields.product_name: ViewSonic VB-WIFI-005 Wi-Fi 6 & Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Module
fields.short_description:
• Smooth Data Transfer: Stream videos, images, and other media content without any delays or interruptions.
  • Dual-Band Wireless Support: This optional Wi-Fi module supports both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies, offering you more flexibility and reliability. The 2.4GHz band provides longer range, while the 5.0GHz band offers faster speeds.
  • Easy Installation and Setup: Simply plug this module into the USB port of your compatible ViewSonic display and follow the on-screen instructions. You can start using the wireless features in minutes.
fields.description:
Upgrade your interactive display experience with the ViewSonic VB-WIFI-005 Wireless Module — a compact, high-performance solution designed to bring Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity to your ViewBoard® or commercial presentation display. Whether in a classroom, conference room, or corporate meeting space, this dual-band wireless module delivers faster connections, smoother streaming, and simplified device pairing — all without messy cables.

⚡ Next-Generation Wi-Fi 6 Performance

Step into the future of wireless connectivity with Wi-Fi 6 (IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax). Enjoy lightning-fast speeds up to 9.6Gbps (theoretical maximum) and improved efficiency even in crowded network environments. With dual-band operation (2.4GHz & 5GHz), MU-MIMO multi-user support, and advanced data management, this module ensures a stable, high-capacity network ideal for HD streaming, wireless presentations, and real-time collaboration.

Whether you’re sharing content during meetings or streaming educational videos, the VB-WIFI-005 ensures smooth, lag-free performance and better signal stability — every time.

🔗 Seamless Bluetooth 5.0 Connectivity

The integrated Bluetooth 5.0 functionality allows effortless connection to wireless accessories such as keyboards, mice, styluses, speakers, and headsets. It offers faster pairing, lower latency, and extended range compared to older Bluetooth versions — perfect for classrooms or meeting rooms where multiple devices need to connect simultaneously.

Experience energy-efficient, low-latency connections ideal for real-time teaching, collaborative sessions, or professional presentations.

🖥️ Optimized for ViewBoard® & Presentation Displays

Specially engineered for ViewSonic interactive displays, the VB-WIFI-005 fits seamlessly into the dedicated wireless module slot — no external dongles or messy cabling required. It’s fully compatible with a wide range of models, including:

  • ViewBoard IFP50-3, IFP50-4, IFP50-5, IFP52, IFP62 Series

  • CDE Series Commercial Displays

This integration keeps your setup clean, professional, and future-ready, turning your display into a powerful wireless hub with just one installation.

📡 Dual-Band Antenna for Maximum Stability

Equipped with a 2T2R dipole antenna design, the VB-WIFI-005 maintains strong, reliable signal strength — even across large rooms or through obstacles. Its enhanced range and interference resistance make it ideal for conference halls, classrooms, and public display setups that demand uninterrupted wireless performance.

No matter where your display is installed, you’ll enjoy steady, high-quality connectivity for data sharing, video streaming, and device synchronization.

⚙️ Compact, Durable & Energy Efficient

Small but mighty, this module measures 99 x 11 x 77 mm and is built with an energy-efficient 5V DC (up to 900mA) power input — ideal for 24/7 operation. With a robust build and wide operating temperature range (0°C to 40°C), it’s engineered for long-lasting reliability in professional and educational environments.

Despite its compact size, the VB-WIFI-005 delivers the durability and performance you’d expect from ViewSonic — making it a dependable choice for long-term deployments.

🔌 Plug-and-Play Installation

Forget about complicated setups. The VB-WIFI-005 offers a true plug-and-play experience:

  1. Power off your display.

  2. Insert the module into the wireless slot.

  3. Power on — the system automatically detects it.

  4. Connect to your preferred Wi-Fi network and pair Bluetooth devices instantly.

No drivers, no extra software, no technical hassle — just instant connectivity that saves you time and effort.

🌍 Wide Range of Applications

The VB-WIFI-005 is designed to adapt to a variety of professional and educational environments:

  • 🏫 Education: Enables teachers and students to share screens, collaborate wirelessly, and connect multiple devices without lag.

  • 💼 Corporate Offices: Perfect for wireless presentations and conference calls in meeting rooms.

  • 🧠 Training Centers: Ideal for interactive learning and multimedia content delivery.

  • 🏨 Public Display Systems: Use in hotels, lobbies, kiosks, and retail signage setups where running Ethernet cables is inconvenient.

Wherever you need reliable, high-speed wireless connectivity, this module makes it happen — effortlessly.

🔒 Secure & Reliable Connectivity

Enjoy peace of mind knowing your network is protected. The VB-WIFI-005 supports modern encryption protocols and offers robust security for both Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connections. It’s designed to maintain a strong, secure link even during extended operation or in network-dense environments.

⚙️ Technical Specifications

Specification Details
Model VB-WIFI-005
Wireless Standard IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax (Wi-Fi 6)
Frequency Bands Dual-band (2.4GHz / 5GHz)
Max Data Rate Up to 9.6Gbps
Antenna 2T2R Dipole
Bluetooth Version 5.0
Power Supply 5V DC, up to 900mA
Operating Temperature 0°C – 40°C
Storage Temperature -20°C – 60°C
Humidity 10% – 90% (non-condensing)
Dimensions 99 × 11 × 77 mm
Certifications FCC, CE, RoHS compliant

🌟 Why Choose the ViewSonic VB-WIFI-005?

  • Faster Speeds: Up to 40% faster than Wi-Fi 5 modules.

  • Better Efficiency: Optimized for multi-user environments with minimal lag.

  • Stable Signal: Reliable coverage even through walls and large spaces.

  • Modern Security: Supports advanced encryption protocols.

  • Plug-and-Play Simplicity: No software or drivers required.

Whether you’re enhancing a ViewBoard display for wireless learning or upgrading a commercial signage setup for digital engagement, the VB-WIFI-005 delivers everything you need for next-level wireless performance.

💬 Conclusion

The ViewSonic VB-WIFI-005 Wireless Module is more than an accessory — it’s the key to unlocking your display’s full connectivity potential. Combining Wi-Fi 6’s speed and stability with Bluetooth 5.0 versatility, it transforms any compatible ViewBoard or digital signage display into a fully wireless, collaboration-ready system.

Reliable, fast, and effortless — this module is the ideal upgrade for educators, professionals, and organizations that value efficiency, innovation, and seamless integration.
