fields.product_name: Redragon CC-1013 RGB CPU Cooler with Temp Display & 4 Heat Pipes
fields.short_description: Digital display for temperature 4Xø6MM heat pipes 12CM ARGB PWM fnas Support intel LGA/1700/1200/115X/1366AMD AM5/AM4 Fan speed 800-1800+10% 72.6 CFM - Digital Clock for Temperature
fields.description:
The Redragon CC-1013 RGB CPU Cooler is a powerful and stylish air cooling solution built for gamers, creators, and PC enthusiasts who want high thermal performance and modern RGB aesthetics in one package. Equipped with 4 advanced 6mm heat pipes, a 12cm ARGB PWM fan, and a real-time digital temperature display, it provides both functionality and beauty to your build.

Its innovative temperature display allows you to monitor your CPU heat levels directly from the cooler, ensuring precise control during gaming sessions or heavy workloads. The ARGB fan lighting adds a vivid and customizable glow to your setup, easily synchronized with other RGB components for a unified look.

With a fan speed range of 800–1800 RPM (±10%), this cooler delivers up to 72.6 CFM of airflow, ensuring efficient heat dissipation while maintaining a low noise profile. The Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) control adjusts fan speed dynamically according to system temperature, balancing performance and silence automatically.

The CC-1013 supports a wide range of sockets, including Intel LGA 1700 / 1200 / 115X / 1366 and AMD AM5 / AM4, ensuring hassle-free compatibility with modern and previous-generation CPUs. Its compact and durable design makes it suitable for both mid-tower and compact cases without sacrificing efficiency.

Perfect for users who value performance, silence, and design, the Redragon CC-1013 is the ideal upgrade for maintaining cool temperatures and smooth performance during gaming, content creation, or high-load computing.

⚙️ Key Features:

  • Real-Time Temperature Display: Instantly monitor CPU temperature for safe performance.

  • 4× Ø6mm Heat Pipes: High-efficiency copper heat pipes for maximum heat transfer.

  • 12cm ARGB PWM Fan: Bright customizable RGB lighting with smart speed control.

  • Strong Airflow: 72.6 CFM for stable and cool operation under heavy load.

  • Wide CPU Compatibility: Supports Intel LGA 1700/1200/115X/1366 and AMD AM5/AM4 sockets.

  • Quiet Operation: Optimized fan blade design minimizes noise while maintaining airflow.

fields.short_description:

fields.description:
Give your gaming rig the upgrade it deserves with the Redragon GCP03 White RGB GPU Support Bracket — a perfect fusion of style, strength, and stability. Designed to eliminate GPU sag while adding a vibrant ARGB glow, this support bracket enhances both the aesthetic appeal and structural integrity of your setup. Whether you’re a gamer, PC modder, or enthusiast, the GCP03 ensures your graphics card stays secure and stylish.

💪 Enhanced GPU Stability

Say goodbye to GPU sag and deformation! The Redragon GCP03 GPU brace is engineered with reinforced structural integrity to counter the downward pull caused by heavy high-end graphics cards. Its solid build ensures your GPU remains perfectly level, preventing strain on your motherboard and PCIe slots.

Enjoy the confidence of knowing your GPU is secure, stable, and optimized for long-term performance — no more bending, sagging, or alignment worries.

🧱 Premium Build Quality & Materials

Crafted from high-quality ABS plastic and durable aluminum alloy, the GCP03 offers exceptional strength and longevity. The combination of materials provides sturdy support while also ensuring efficient heat dissipation to maintain system performance.

The metallic finish gives your gaming PC a refined and modern look, with a subtle sheen that complements any white or RGB-themed setup. It’s not just a bracket — it’s a stylish addition to your gaming station.

⚙️ Adjustable Design for Perfect Fit

Every build is different — and the GCP03 GPU holder adapts to them all. With its sliding adjustable arm, you can fine-tune the support point to match the length and height of your graphics card.

  • Mounting Height: 50mm

  • Compatibility: Works with most GPU sizes and case configurations

Before installation, ensure your PC case has enough space and PCI slots for the bracket. Once in place, it provides precise, tailored support for your GPU, regardless of its dimensions.

🌈 Brilliant ARGB Lighting Effects

Turn your GPU support into a visual centerpiece with customizable white ARGB lighting. The GCP03 features a built-in 5V 3-pin ARGB lighting system, allowing full synchronization with your motherboard’s lighting software for a unified glow across your entire setup.

It supports dynamic lighting effects, including color transitions, breathing modes, and pulsing patterns — giving your gaming rig a futuristic touch.
⚠️ Note: Please connect only to 5V 3-pin ARGB headers. Do not connect to 4-pin 12V RGB ports.

🧰 Quick & Easy Installation

The Redragon GCP03 White GPU Bracket is designed with simplicity in mind. Thanks to its user-friendly structure and included mounting accessories, you can install it in minutes — no advanced technical skills required.

Everything you need is right in the box:

  • Mounting screws

  • Support bracket components

  • User guide

Even beginners can achieve a professional-grade installation with minimal effort.

🎮 Ideal for Gamers & PC Builders

Built by Redragon — a name trusted by gaming enthusiasts — the GCP03W GPU Support Bracket is perfect for those who value both performance and presentation. Its combination of strong build quality, adjustable flexibility, and synchronized lighting makes it an ideal choice for:

  • Gaming PCs seeking a clean, professional look

  • RGB builds that demand visual consistency

  • High-end GPU users who want reliable support against sagging

  • DIY builders looking for a simple yet premium accessory

Whether you’re showcasing your rig or maximizing system longevity, the Redragon GCP03 delivers in every way.

🔧 Key Features at a Glance

  • Type: RGB GPU Support Bracket

  • Material: Aluminum Alloy + ABS

  • Lighting: White ARGB, 5V 3-pin Sync (Motherboard Compatible)

The Redragon GCP03 isn’t just a functional accessory — it’s a statement piece for serious gamers and PC builders. Designed to protect your investment while enhancing your rig’s aesthetics, this bracket ensures your graphics card performs reliably and looks stunning doing it.

With solid support, modern design, and synchronized ARGB lighting, it’s the perfect finishing touch for any white or RGB build. Keep your GPU stable. Keep your setup glowing. Choose Redragon GCP03 — where performance meets style.

fields.product_name: Tekspring DC7B Portable Document Scanner & Camera
fields.short_description: The Tekspring DC7B Portable Scanner is a plug-and-play USB document camera featuring an 8-megapixel image sensor, autofocus, and support for 3264 × 2448 resolution at up to 30 fps. Designed for seamless compatibility with Windows, Mac and Chromebook systems, it connects via USB 2.0 and works directly with video-conferencing platforms like Zoom, Skype and Microsoft Teams.
fields.description:
Transform the way you capture, present, and share information with the Tekspring DC7B Portable Scanner — a high-resolution USB document camera designed for professionals, teachers, and remote workers. With its 8-megapixel clarity, plug-and-play simplicity, and foldable, travel-friendly design, the DC7B delivers performance and convenience in one compact device. Whether you’re digitizing documents, conducting online classes, or showcasing 3D objects in meetings, this scanner helps you work smarter and present better — anywhere.

📸 High-Resolution Image Capture with 8MP Precision

The Tekspring DC7B Portable Scanner features an 8-megapixel CMOS sensor, capable of capturing documents and images with incredible sharpness and color accuracy. With a maximum resolution of 3264 × 2448 pixels, it ensures every text, graph, and image detail is perfectly reproduced.

From scanning contracts and receipts to displaying textbook pages or ID cards, you’ll enjoy crisp, distortion-free images every time. The autofocus lens automatically adjusts to different heights and object sizes, saving you time and ensuring crystal-clear results — perfect for busy professionals and educators.

⚡ Plug-and-Play Convenience

Forget about driver installations or complex setups. The Tekspring DC7B is a true plug-and-play USB 2.0 device — just connect it to your computer, and it’s ready to scan or stream instantly.

Compatible with Windows, macOS, and Chrome OS, it easily integrates with laptops, desktops, and Chromebooks commonly used in classrooms and offices. This makes it a versatile and universal scanning tool, ideal for hybrid learning, remote collaboration, or professional presentations.

🖥️ Dual Functionality – Scanner & Document Camera

The DC7B isn’t just a scanner — it’s also a live document camera for teaching, training, and online meetings. It streams real-time video up to 1080p at 30fps, making it a perfect companion for apps like Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, and Skype.

Teachers can display worksheets, demonstrate handwriting, or showcase science experiments. Office professionals can present reports, product prototypes, or ID verification processes — all with live, clear visuals that enhance engagement and communication.

🧳 Compact, Foldable & Travel-Friendly Design

The Tekspring DC7B Portable Scanner is built for mobility. Its lightweight, foldable arm design makes it easy to carry between classrooms, offices, or client meetings. Despite its slim profile, the sturdy base ensures stability during scanning or live presentation.

The adjustable arm allows users to modify the scanning height and angle, offering full control over framing and coverage. Whether you’re capturing a large book spread or a small ID card, this scanner adapts effortlessly to your needs.

💼 Multi-Purpose Tool for Professionals, Teachers & Creatives

The DC7B is a versatile imaging solution that caters to multiple professions and use cases:

  • Educators & Trainers: Perfect for displaying textbooks, diagrams, and handwritten notes in real-time during lessons.

  • Office & Admin Professionals: Great for scanning contracts, invoices, or ID cards quickly and efficiently.

  • Designers & Artists: Ideal for capturing artwork, sketches, or product designs in high resolution.

fields.description:
Take your PC build to the next level with the Boost Enclosure Pro Series P100, a sleek, high-performance gaming case designed for gamers, content creators, and PC enthusiasts alike. Combining style, functionality, and expandability, this mid-tower chassis ensures your components not only perform at their best but also look stunning.

Premium Design & Build
Crafted with high-quality SPCC steel and a tempered glass side panel, the Boost P100 offers durability and elegance. The tempered glass provides a full view of your internal components, allowing your RGB fans and high-end hardware to shine. Its modern black finish complements any gaming setup, making your rig a true centerpiece.

Efficient Cooling & Airflow
The Boost P100 comes with 3 pre-installed F100 ARGB fans and supports up to six fans in total (3 front, 2 top, 1 rear). Coupled with its mesh front and ventilated panels, this case ensures optimal airflow to keep your CPU and GPU temperatures low, even during intense gaming sessions. For liquid cooling enthusiasts, it supports up to 240mm radiators, giving you versatile cooling options for your high-performance builds.

Spacious Interior & Compatibility
Despite its compact appearance, the Boost P100 offers ample room for full-sized components:

  • Motherboard Support: ATX / MicroATX

  • GPU Compatibility: Up to 335mm in length

  • CPU Cooler Height: Up to 160mm

  • Storage Options: 1 × 3.5” HDD, 1 × 2.5” SSD

  • Expansion Slots: 7 PCI slots for graphics cards and expansion cards

Optimized cable management ensures a clean, professional-looking build, with plenty of room to route power and data cables neatly, reducing clutter and improving airflow.

RGB Lighting & Customization
The 3 pre-installed ARGB fans bring vibrant, customizable lighting to your setup. Easily sync and control fan lighting modes via the front panel RGB controller, allowing you to personalize your rig to match your style or gaming environment.

Convenient Front I/O
The Boost P100 makes connectivity simple, offering:

  • USB 3.0 × 1

  • USB 1.0 × 2

  • HD Audio (Mic & Headphone)

  • Power, Reset, and RGB control buttons

Why Choose Boost Enclosure Pro Series P100?
This case is perfect for gamers and PC builders who want:

  • Stylish, modern aesthetics with tempered glass and ARGB lighting

  • Flexible cooling options with air and water cooling support

  • Ample space for high-end GPUs, storage drives, and cable management

  • A durable and functional design that enhances airflow and performance

The Boost P100 is not just a PC case—it’s the foundation for a gaming rig that performs beautifully, stays cool under pressure, and looks impressive from every angle.

fields.product_name: ViewSonic CDE6514-2C 65” 4K Commercial Display
fields.short_description:
65" 4K Commercial Display with ProAV Integration

  • Quad-Core SoC with 4 GB RAM delivers smooth, stable performance.
  • Fast warm boot launches signage and content in under seven seconds.
  • USB playback with signal failover ensures continuous content delivery.
  • 4K UHD in any orientation provides sharp, professional visuals.
  • 500-nit brightness and 24/7 operation support reliable round-the-clock signage.
  • ProAV integration and remote control via ViewSonic Manager and leading platforms.
fields.description:
Experience next-level clarity, performance, and reliability with the ViewSonic CDE6514-2C 65” 4K Commercial Digital Display — a professional-grade solution built for seamless communication, stunning visuals, and 24/7 operation. Designed to meet the demands of corporate, retail, education, and signage environments, this display delivers exceptional image quality and smart functionality that keeps your message shining bright, anytime and anywhere.

⚡ Instant Start-Up with Ultra-Fast Warm Boot

Time is money, especially in professional environments. The ViewSonic CDE6514-2C boots up in under 7 seconds, ensuring that meetings, presentations, and scheduled signage start without delay. Say goodbye to awkward pauses and hello to instant communication — perfect for corporate boardrooms, retail displays, and educational institutions where every second counts.

💪 Smooth Multitasking & Reliable Performance

Powered by a Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A73 processor and 4GB DDR4 RAM, this 65-inch 4K display runs on Android 14 OS (upgradeable to Android 16), offering fluid multitasking and powerful media playback. Whether you’re streaming 4K content, running interactive applications, or managing digital signage networks, the CDE6514-2C delivers dependable and responsive performance all day long.

🖥️ True 4K Resolution — Detail That Inspires

Immerse your audience in native 4K Ultra HD (3840 x 2160) resolution. Unlike standard upscaled 4K displays, the CDE6514-2C delivers razor-sharp visuals and lifelike colors in both landscape and portrait orientations. Every image, video, and presentation looks stunningly detailed and professional — ideal for visual marketing, digital menu boards, or educational content.

🔁 Flexible Orientation for Any Space

From wall-mounted signage in retail stores to vertical information boards in corporate lobbies, the CDE6514-2C adapts effortlessly. With landscape and portrait orientation support, you have complete flexibility to design your display layout just the way you envision it.

🕐 Built for 24/7 Operation

Engineered for continuous use, this commercial-grade digital display ensures uninterrupted performance even in high-demand environments. With 500 nits of brightness and a robust panel life of 50,000 hours, it delivers crisp, vibrant visuals that stand out in any indoor lighting condition. Perfect for business-critical operations where downtime is not an option.

💡 Scheduled USB Media Playback

Simplify your signage operations with USB Auto-Play and scheduled playback. Whether it’s video, audio, or image content, the CDE6514-2C automatically detects and plays your media files without needing a connected PC. Ideal for retail stores, waiting areas, or events that rely on consistent, automated content display.

🔄 Signal Failover for Continuous Display

Never let a blank screen interrupt your message. The Signal Failover feature ensures that if one input source fails, the system automatically switches to another — such as an alternate HDMI or USB-C input. This keeps your content running smoothly in high-traffic or mission-critical environments, like transportation hubs or digital signage networks.

🔌 One-Cable USB-C Connectivity

Enjoy hassle-free connectivity with the integrated USB-C port, which supports video, data, Ethernet, and 15W charging — all through a single cable. Connect your laptop and start presenting instantly, reducing cable clutter and setup time. This feature makes the CDE6514-2C perfect for shared workspaces, conference rooms, and hybrid offices.

📡 Wireless Presentations with ViewShare

Collaborate freely with the ViewShare WPD-900 Wireless Casting Kit (sold separately). Present in Full HD wirelessly from your laptop or mobile device without Wi-Fi or software installation. The secure, point-to-point connection ensures smooth, lag-free screen sharing, while one-click switching between presenters enhances teamwork and meeting efficiency.

🔊 Built-In Dual Speakers for Clear Sound

With dual 10W built-in speakers, the ViewSonic CDE6514-2C offers crisp, room-filling audio — eliminating the need for external sound systems in smaller spaces. For larger setups, the 3.5mm audio output lets you connect external speakers for an immersive AV experience, making it suitable for classrooms, lobbies, and conference halls.

🌐 Remote Management Made Easy

IT administrators will appreciate the convenience of ViewSonic Manager, a browser-based remote management platform that enables real-time monitoring, control, and troubleshooting. Manage multiple displays, adjust inputs, or perform updates directly from your desktop — no on-site maintenance required.

🌱 Environmentally Responsible Design

Sustainability meets performance. The CDE6514-2C is EPEAT Silver rated, ENERGY STAR® certified, and RoHS compliant, reducing energy consumption while maintaining outstanding performance. With an EEI level E rating, it aligns with global standards for environmental efficiency and responsible energy use.

📦 Technical Specifications

Display: 65-inch TFT LCD (DLED backlight)
Resolution: 3840 x 2160 (4K UHD)
Brightness: 500 nits
Contrast Ratio: 1500:1 (typ.), 2000:1 (DCR enabled)
Response Time: 11ms
Viewing Angle: 178° (H/V)
Processor: Quad-core ARM Cortex-A73
RAM: 4GB DDR4
Storage: 32GB
Inputs: HDMI x3 (HDMI 2.1, ARC support), USB-C, Audio Out, LAN, RS-232, WiFi Slot
Orientation: Landscape & Portrait
Mounting: VESA 400x400mm
Speakers: Dual 10W

💼 Perfect For:

  • Corporate meeting rooms & boardrooms

  • Retail signage and digital advertising

  • Educational displays & classroom presentations

  • Transportation hubs & public information screens

  • 24/7 commercial operations

The ViewSonic CDE6514-2C 65” 4K Commercial Display combines professional-grade hardware, intelligent performance, and effortless connectivity to deliver a truly all-in-one display solution for modern businesses. Whether you’re showcasing products, engaging students, or running a smart conference room, this display guarantees clarity, reliability, and impact — every single day.

fields.description:
Elevate your gaming setup with the Redragon K586 Brahma Wired Mechanical Gaming Keyboard, a feature-packed 104-key RGB keyboard built for precision, durability, and comfort. Perfect for both gamers and productivity users, the K586 combines high-performance mechanical switches, customizable RGB lighting, and ergonomic design for a professional-grade experience.

Mechanical Blue Switches for Ultimate Feedback
Equipped with OUTEMU Blue switches, this keyboard delivers tactile, clicky feedback for every keystroke, ensuring fast response times and a satisfying typing experience. Rated for 100 million keystrokes, these switches are built to last for intense gaming sessions and daily typing. Optional Brown switches are also available for a quieter tactile feel.

Programmable Macros & Media Controls
Take full control with 10 on-board programmable macro keys (G1–G10), allowing you to record complex commands on the fly without software. Dedicated media controls let you play, pause, skip tracks, adjust volume, and tweak RGB brightness directly from the keyboard.

Customizable RGB Backlighting
Immerse yourself in 16.8 million colors with 18 pre-set lighting modes, or create your own custom effects for a truly unique setup. Individual key lighting can be adjusted for brightness and effect to match your mood or game.

Anti-Ghosting & Full Key Rollover
The K586 supports 104-key anti-ghosting, ensuring every keystroke registers accurately, even during high-intensity gaming sessions. Execute combos and commands flawlessly without missing a beat.

Ergonomic Design & Comfort
Designed with ergonomics in mind, this keyboard includes a magnetic detachable wrist rest for extended gaming or typing sessions, reducing fatigue and providing superior support. Height-adjustable feet let you customize your typing angle.

Optional Software Support
Enhance your experience with optional Redragon software for advanced macro setup and RGB customization. Settings can be saved on a Windows system and applied on other devices, though Mac OS is not natively supported.

fields.product_name: Redragon CC-2188 Hodur Dual Tower ARGB CPU Cooler
fields.description:
Experience next-level cooling efficiency and stunning RGB aesthetics with the Redragon CC-2188 Hodur Dual Tower ARGB CPU Air Cooler — a powerhouse designed to keep your gaming or professional PC running cool, quiet, and visually striking. With its dual-tower heatsink design, six advanced heat pipes, and low-noise ARGB fans, this CPU cooler delivers superior thermal performance while adding a dynamic touch of style to your build.

🔥 Exceptional Cooling Power

The Redragon CC-2188 Hodur is built for enthusiasts who demand both performance and beauty. Featuring a dual-tower aluminum fin design and six high-efficiency copper heat pipes, this cooler ensures exceptional heat dissipation even during the most demanding workloads or gaming marathons.

The innovative direct-contact copper coldplate ensures optimal thermal transfer from your CPU to the heat pipes, allowing for quick and effective cooling. Whether you're overclocking or just ensuring stable performance under load, the CC-2188 delivers consistent and reliable results.

Key Cooling Highlights:

  • Dual-tower aluminum fin array for maximum airflow.

  • Six direct-contact copper heat pipes for efficient heat transfer.

  • Designed for optimal airflow and minimal resistance.

  • Includes premium thermal paste for best installation results.

🌈 Vibrant ARGB Lighting with Precision Control

Cooling meets style with the Redragon CC-2188’s dual 120mm ARGB fans. Each fan is equipped with a 3-pin (5V-D-G) ARGB connector, fully compatible with leading motherboard lighting systems such as:

  • ASUS Aura Sync

  • MSI Mystic Light Sync

  • Gigabyte RGB Fusion

  • ASRock Polychrome Sync

These vivid addressable RGB effects bring your PC to life, allowing full customization to match your unique theme. From subtle glows to dynamic rainbow waves — you’re in total control of your rig’s personality.

Lighting Features:

  • Fully addressable ARGB illumination on fans.

  • Compatible with major motherboard RGB sync software.

  • 3-pin (5V-D-G) connector ensures seamless lighting control.

  • Sleek black PBT shroud for a premium and stealthy look.

🌀 Whisper-Quiet Dual 120mm PWM Fans

Performance doesn’t have to be noisy. The CC-2188’s dual 120mm PWM-controlled fans deliver powerful airflow — up to 72CFM — while maintaining a whisper-quiet operation. The fans automatically adjust speed between 700 to 1800 RPM, optimizing cooling performance and noise levels based on system temperature.

Fan Specifications:

  • Speed: 700–1800 RPM ±10%

  • Airflow: Up to 72 CFM

  • Noise Level: Low-noise operation with PBT shell dampening

  • Bearing: Long-life Hydraulic Bearing for extended reliability

Enjoy stable cooling during intensive gaming, rendering, or streaming — without the distracting fan noise.

⚙️ Superior Build & Durable Design

Redragon’s commitment to quality is evident in every component of the CC-2188 Hodur. From its reinforced dual aluminum towers to the robust heat pipes and vibration-dampened fan mounts, this cooler is built for long-term performance.

The outer PBT shroud minimizes unwanted noise, while the thick, dense fin stack improves heat transfer efficiency. Every detail is designed for maximum durability and aesthetic perfection.

🔩 Universal Compatibility & Easy Installation

The Redragon CC-2188 supports a wide range of Intel and AMD sockets, making it a versatile choice for almost any modern setup. Measuring 164mm in height, it fits comfortably in most mid-tower and full-tower cases.

Supported CPU Sockets:

  • Intel: LGA 2066 / 2011-v3 / 2011 / 1700 / 1200 / 1151 / 1150 / 1155

  • AMD: AM5 / AM4 / AM3+ / FM2+

With its all-metal mounting brackets and secure lock design, installation is quick, easy, and stable — ensuring a tight, vibration-free fit.

🌟 Why Choose the Redragon CC-2188 Hodur

  • Dual-tower heatsink design for maximum cooling capacity.

  • Six direct-contact copper heat pipes for superior heat transfer.

  • Dual 120mm PWM fans with quiet, high-performance airflow.

  • Fully customizable ARGB lighting to match any setup.

  • Compatible with major Intel and AMD platforms.

  • Designed for durability, efficiency, and visual appeal.

Whether you’re building a high-end gaming PC or a productivity powerhouse, the Redragon CC-2188 Hodur Dual Tower ARGB Cooler ensures your CPU stays cool and your setup looks absolutely stunning.

💬 Final Thoughts

The Redragon CC-2188 Hodur isn’t just another CPU air cooler — it’s a perfect blend of performance, silence, and aesthetics. With its dual-tower design, six copper heat pipes, and synchronized ARGB lighting, it stands out as one of the most efficient and visually appealing cooling solutions in its class. Ideal for gamers, creators, and performance enthusiasts, it ensures your CPU remains cool under pressure — while looking cooler than ever.

fields.product_name: Redragon GA200 ERIS Console Keyboard & Mouse Converter
fields.short_description: Convertor supports Xbox One/PS4/Switch/PS3 Consoles, which use mouse and keyboard to play FPS games like PUBG,Fortnite on Xbox One/PS4/Switch/PS3 consoles.
fields.description:
Unlock the true power of your console gaming experience with the Redragon GA200 ERIS Converter — a cutting-edge adapter designed to bring keyboard and mouse precision to your favorite console games. Whether you play on Xbox One, PS4, Nintendo Switch, or PS3, this smart converter gives you the speed, accuracy, and control of a PC setup, all while keeping your console convenience intact.

Built with advanced Katana Chip technology and designed for universal compatibility, the GA200 ERIS lets you dominate FPS, TPS, and RTS games with unmatched fluidity and responsiveness.

🎮 Play Like a Pro on Any Console

Say goodbye to controller limitations. The Redragon GA200 ERIS offers multiplatform support for all major gaming consoles, including:

  • Xbox One

  • PlayStation 4 (PS4)

  • Nintendo Switch

  • PlayStation 3 (PS3)

Simply connect your favorite keyboard and mouse to the converter, plug it into your console, and experience PC-style precision instantly. Perfect for gamers who love playing shooters like PUBG, Call of Duty, Apex Legends, Fortnite, or Overwatch, where aiming accuracy makes all the difference.

⚡ Universal Game Support & Simplified Setup

Forget about complicated configurations. The GA200 ERIS features plug-and-play installation — no special software or drivers needed. It works with 100% of console games, automatically recognizing your inputs for a seamless experience.

Just plug in, configure your controls, and start gaming. It’s that simple.

🧠 Powered by Katana Chip Technology

At the heart of the GA200 ERIS lies Redragon’s proprietary Katana Chip, which ensures lightning-fast signal conversion and near-zero input lag. This means every keystroke and mouse movement is registered instantly, delivering smooth and accurate response times during intense gameplay.

With keyboard and mouse command emulation, your console interprets your actions just like a native controller — giving you full control without compromise.

💡 Compact, Modern & Functional Design

The Redragon GA200 ERIS Converter stands out with its sleek and compact aluminum design, accented by vibrant LED indicators for easy function monitoring. These LEDs clearly display connection status and active mode, ensuring you always know when your setup is ready to go.

Its portable size makes it ideal for gamers who like to play at home or on the go — easily fitting in your gear bag for LAN events or travel.

🕹️ Perfect for Competitive & Casual Gaming Alike

Whether you’re a pro player looking for more precise control in FPS (First-Person Shooter) games or just want the comfort of a keyboard and mouse for RTS (Real-Time Strategy) or TPS (Third-Person Shooter) titles, the GA200 delivers an enhanced experience that feels natural and intuitive.

Play your favorite console titles with PC-like responsiveness, and unleash your true gaming potential.

🔧 Universal Compatibility

The Redragon GA200 ERIS Converter supports:

  • All Redragon gaming peripherals (mice, keyboards, and combos)

  • Nearly 100% of other major brands on the market
    This makes it one of the most flexible converters available, ready to pair with any gear in your setup.

⚙️ Technical Specifications

  • Model: Redragon GA200 ERIS Converter

  • Supported Platforms: Xbox One, PS4, Switch, PS3

  • Input Devices: Keyboard & Mouse (All Major Brands)

  • Technology: Katana Chip – Command Conversion Engine

  • LED Indicators: Multi-color function lights

  • Compatibility: Supports 100% of console games

  • Design: Compact, durable, and portable

  • Installation: Plug & Play (No Drivers Needed)

🌟 Why Choose the Redragon GA200 ERIS?

The Redragon GA200 ERIS Converter gives you the best of both worlds — the power and control of a PC setup combined with the ease of console gaming. With universal compatibility, instant setup, and precision-focused Katana Chip technology, it’s engineered to help gamers perform at their absolute best.

If you want to aim faster, move smoother, and play smarter, the Redragon GA200 ERIS is your ultimate edge in the gaming arena.

Step up your game. Feel the difference. Play like a pro.

fields.product_name: Aftershock Rapid Lite Gaming Case with 3 ARGB Fans
fields.short_description:
Rapid Lite

Dimensions

365mm x 216mm x 405mm [L x W x H]

I/O Panel

2x USB 3.0

1x HD AUDIO

1x MIC

Cooling Fans Support

Top - 2x 120mm/ 140mm

Radiator Support

fields.description:
Take your gaming setup to the next level with the Aftershock Rapid Lite Case with 3 ARGB Fans. Designed for performance, aesthetics, and cooling efficiency, this mid-tower chassis is perfect for esports enthusiasts and gamers who demand both style and functionality.

High Airflow Design
The Rapid Lite is built to keep your system cool under intense gaming sessions. With a ventilated mesh front and top panels, airflow is maximized to ensure your CPU, GPU, and other components stay at optimal temperatures. Dust filters on the top and bottom make maintenance easy while protecting your hardware.

Showcase Your Build
Featuring tempered glass panels, the Rapid Lite allows you to display your components, RGB lighting, and custom cable routing. The integrated 3 ARGB fans not only provide excellent cooling but also add vibrant, customizable lighting to your rig. Sync the lighting with compatible motherboards for a unified visual effect.

Spacious & Compatible

  • Motherboard Support: ATX, Micro-ATX, Mini-ITX

  • GPU Clearance: Up to ~330 mm

  • CPU Cooler Height: Up to 165 mm

  • Storage Options: 2 × 3.5″ HDD + 2 × 2.5″ SSD

  • Drive Bays: Modular trays for easy installation

Cooling & Radiator Support

  • Front: 2 × 120 / 140 mm fans or 240 / 280 mm radiator

  • Top: 2 × 120 / 140 mm fans or 240 mm radiator

  • Rear: 1 × 120 mm fan / radiator

This case supports up to 6 × 120 mm fans in total, giving you flexibility for advanced cooling setups or custom liquid cooling loops.

Convenient Front I/O

  • 2 × USB 3.0 ports

  • 1 × HD Audio, 1 × Mic jack

Easily connect your peripherals, headphones, or microphone for seamless gaming sessions.

User-Friendly Features
The Rapid Lite offers tool-less side panels, pre-installed standoffs, and modular drive trays for quick assembly and easy upgrades. Cable management space ensures a clean and organized build.

Compact Yet Capable
With dimensions of 365 × 216 × 405 mm, the Rapid Lite strikes the perfect balance between size and component compatibility. It fits comfortably on or under your desk while supporting high-performance components for serious gaming builds.

Why Choose Aftershock Rapid Lite?

  • Mid-tower design optimized for esports and high-performance PCs

  • 3 ARGB fans included for stylish, customizable lighting

  • Tempered glass panels to showcase your build

  • Superior airflow with mesh front and top panels

  • Modular storage and tool-less installation for easy upgrades

  • Supports ATX, Micro-ATX, and Mini-ITX motherboards

Whether you’re building a new gaming rig or upgrading your existing setup, the Aftershock Rapid Lite Case with 3 ARGB Fans delivers performance, style, and cooling efficiency in a compact, gamer-friendly package.

fields.product_name: Redragon K512 SHIVA RGB Backlit Gaming Keyboard
fields.short_description: 6 On-board Macro Keys. True RGB Backlit, 7 pre-set backlight patterns and 6 customized modes 26 Anti-ghost Keys & Dedicated Media Controls Detachable wrist rest
fields.description:
Enhance your gaming experience with the Redragon K512 SHIVA RGB Backlit Membrane Gaming Keyboard, a powerful and stylish keyboard designed for both competitive gamers and casual players. Combining mechanical-feel keys, dynamic RGB lighting, and customizable macros, this keyboard delivers performance, comfort, and style in every session.

6 On-Board Macro Keys for Ultimate Control
Take control of your gameplay with 6 programmable macro keys (G1~G6). Record macros on the fly without any extra software, allowing you to customize commands and create complex combos easily. This feature gives you a competitive advantage while keeping your setup sleek and efficient.

Dynamic RGB Backlighting
The K512 SHIVA features true RGB backlighting with 7 preset patterns and 6 custom modes. You can tailor the lighting to match your gaming style or turn it off entirely when you prefer a minimalist look. Each key is crafted with double-shot injection molded keycaps, ensuring long-lasting durability and vibrant colors that won’t fade.

26 Anti-Ghost Keys & Dedicated Media Controls
Experience flawless responsiveness with 26-key anti-ghosting technology, allowing multiple keys to be pressed simultaneously without missed inputs. The dedicated media controls let you play, pause, or skip your music without interrupting your game, making it easy to stay immersed in your gameplay.

Ergonomic Design for Comfortable Gaming
The K512 SHIVA comes with a detachable wrist rest connected by magnets, offering superior support and reducing fatigue during long gaming or typing sessions. Its ergonomic design ensures comfort without compromising on performance.

Professional Software & Long-Lasting Durability
Customize your keyboard experience using Redragon’s professional software, which allows you to set backlights, assign macros, and personalize your setup. Tested for over 100 million keystrokes, this keyboard is built to withstand intense gaming sessions while maintaining performance and aesthetics.

Specifications at a Glance:

  • 6 programmable on-board macro keys (G1~G6)

  • True RGB backlighting with 7 preset patterns and 6 custom modes

  • 26-key anti-ghosting for precise gaming

  • Dedicated media controls for convenience

  • Detachable magnetic wrist rest for ergonomic support

  • Double-shot injection molded keycaps for durability

  • Membrane switches with mechanical-feel for responsive typing

Whether you’re conquering online battles, streaming content, or typing for hours, the Redragon K512 SHIVA RGB Gaming Keyboard provides comfort, customization, and performance all in one sleek package.

fields.product_name: ViewSonic CDE4314-2C 43” 4K Commercial Display
fields.short_description:
43" 4K Commercial Display with ProAV Integration

  • Quad-Core SoC with 4 GB RAM delivers smooth, stable performance.
  • Fast warm boot launches signage and content in under seven seconds.
  • USB playback with signal failover ensures continuous content delivery.
  • 4K UHD in any orientation provides sharp, professional visuals.
  • 500-nit brightness and 24/7 operation support reliable round-the-clock signage.
  • ProAV integration and remote control via ViewSonic Manager and leading platforms.
fields.description:
Transform your business communication with the ViewSonic CDE4314-2C 43” 4K Commercial Digital Display — a versatile, high-performance display designed to deliver stunning visuals, seamless connectivity, and rock-solid reliability. Perfect for corporate, retail, education, and public signage applications, this display offers crystal-clear 4K resolution, smart Android-powered performance, and 24/7 operational durability to keep your message shining bright around the clock.

⚡ Instant Start-Up for Seamless Presentations

The CDE4314-2C ensures your content appears exactly when needed with its under-7-second warm boot time. Whether it’s a business presentation, a digital advertisement, or classroom content, you’ll enjoy smooth, instant performance without waiting. This feature makes it ideal for corporate boardrooms, classrooms, and retail displays where every moment matters.

💪 Powered by Android for Reliable Performance

Running on Android 14 OS (upgradeable to Android 16), this display combines a Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A73 processor, 4GB DDR4 RAM, and 32GB of internal storage. It delivers seamless multitasking, smooth video playback, and effortless control of multimedia content — ideal for digital signage or collaborative presentations.

🖥️ Stunning Native 4K Ultra HD Resolution

Experience breathtaking detail and clarity with native 4K UHD resolution (3840 x 2160). Unlike upscaled 4K, the CDE4314-2C displays every pixel in true high definition, ensuring your visuals are sharp and lifelike. Whether showcasing intricate product visuals, educational content, or advertising media, you’ll enjoy crystal-clear images from any angle, thanks to its 178° viewing angle and anti-glare coating.

🔄 Portrait & Landscape Flexibility

This commercial display supports both landscape and portrait orientations, giving you complete flexibility in how you present your content. Use it horizontally for presentations or vertically for menu boards, advertising, and wayfinding displays — the CDE4314-2C adapts easily to fit your environment and visual goals.

💡 Built for 24/7 Operation

Designed for continuous use, this commercial-grade display offers 500 nits of brightness, a 1200:1 contrast ratio (2000:1 with DCR), and a 50,000-hour backlight life, ensuring vibrant, clear visuals day and night. It’s the perfect choice for business-critical environments, from airports and hotels to offices and retail spaces.

🔁 Automated USB Media Playback

Simplify your digital signage setup with scheduled USB media playback. The CDE4314-2C automatically detects and plays video, audio, and image files from a USB drive using its Auto-Play or resume-last-source function — no PC required. This makes it ideal for retail signage, exhibitions, and event displays.

🔄 Signal Failover for Continuous Content

Never worry about interruptions again. The Signal Failover function ensures that if one input fails, the display automatically switches to the next available source — HDMI, USB-C, or others — maintaining uninterrupted playback. Perfect for high-traffic or mission-critical areas where constant uptime is essential.

🔌 Simplified Connectivity with USB-C

The one-cable USB-C connection delivers video, audio, Ethernet, data transfer, and 15W power through a single cable — reducing clutter and simplifying your setup. Perfect for meeting rooms and hybrid workspaces, it allows users to connect a laptop and start presenting instantly.

📡 Wireless Screen Casting with ViewShare

For true wireless freedom, pair the display with the optional ViewShare WPD-900 Wireless Screen Casting Kit (sold separately). Present wirelessly from your laptop or smartphone in Full HD — no Wi-Fi or software installation required. With secure point-to-point connections and one-click switching between users, collaboration becomes effortless and efficient.

🔊 Built-In Audio for Complete AV Experience

The dual 10W built-in speakers deliver crisp, balanced sound for smaller rooms such as classrooms or meeting spaces. For larger environments, the 3.5mm audio output enables integration with external sound systems — offering the perfect balance between convenience and versatility.

🌐 Remote Management for IT Efficiency

Streamline your operations with ViewSonic Manager, a web-based management tool that allows administrators to control multiple displays remotely. Monitor performance, switch inputs, and troubleshoot easily using the built-in Remote Desktop feature, saving valuable time and resources for IT teams.

🌱 Environmentally Friendly & Energy Efficient

The CDE4314-2C is EPEAT Silver rated, ENERGY STAR® certified, and RoHS compliant, showcasing ViewSonic’s dedication to eco-friendly design. It’s engineered to minimize energy consumption and environmental impact — a smart, sustainable choice for modern organizations.

⚙️ Technical Specifications

Display Size: 43” (42.5” viewable)
Resolution: 3840 x 2160 (4K UHD)
Brightness: 500 nits (typ.)
Contrast Ratio: 1200:1 (typ.) / 2000:1 (DCR)
Response Time: 8ms
Viewing Angle: 178° (H/V)
Backlight Life: 50,000 hours
Processor: Quad-core ARM Cortex-A73
RAM: 4GB DDR4
Storage: 32GB
Inputs: 3x HDMI (HDMI 2.1 4K@60Hz), USB-C, LAN, Audio Out, RS-232, WiFi Slot
Speakers: 2x 10W
Orientation: Landscape & Portrait
Mounting: VESA 200x200mm

💼 Perfect For:

  • Corporate meeting rooms and conference areas

  • Retail stores and digital signage setups

  • Educational environments and classrooms

  • Public venues, hotels, and transportation hubs

  • Continuous 24/7 commercial operation

The ViewSonic CDE4314-2C 43” 4K Commercial Display combines performance, precision, and professional reliability in a sleek, energy-efficient design. With brilliant 4K visuals, flexible connectivity, and smart management tools, it’s built to help businesses communicate, educate, and inspire — beautifully and effortlessly.

fields.product_name: ViewSonic CDE5514-2C 55” 4K Commercial Display
fields.short_description:
55" 4K Commercial Display with ProAV Integration

  • Quad-Core SoC with 4 GB RAM delivers smooth, stable performance.
  • Fast warm boot launches signage and content in under seven seconds.
  • USB playback with signal failover ensures continuous content delivery.
  • 4K UHD in any orientation provides sharp, professional visuals.
  • 500-nit brightness and 24/7 operation support reliable round-the-clock signage.
  • ProAV integration and remote control via ViewSonic Manager and leading platforms.
fields.description:
Bring your visuals to life with the ViewSonic CDE5514-2C 55” 4K Commercial Digital Display, a powerful, professional-grade solution designed to elevate communication and engagement in any setting. Whether in a corporate meeting room, retail environment, classroom, or public space, this display combines brilliant 4K visuals, reliable performance, and smart connectivity — all engineered for nonstop, 24/7 operation.

⚡ Ultra-Fast Warm Boot for Instant Readiness

No more waiting around to start meetings or presentations. The ViewSonic CDE5514-2C powers up in under 7 seconds, ensuring your content appears the moment you need it. This ultra-fast warm boot feature is perfect for corporate meetings, educational setups, and digital signage, keeping communication seamless and efficient.

💪 Smart Performance Powered by Android

The CDE5514-2C runs on Android 14 OS (upgradeable to Android 16) and features a Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A73 processor, 4GB DDR4 RAM, and 32GB storage for exceptional multitasking and smooth playback. From digital signage to streaming and collaborative meetings, you can expect fluid performance, reliable operation, and compatibility with a wide range of apps and media.

🖥️ Native 4K UHD Resolution — Every Pixel Counts

Enjoy unmatched clarity with true 4K Ultra HD resolution (3840 x 2160). The display’s advanced 8-bit + FRC color depth and anti-glare coating ensure stunning visuals that stay vibrant in any indoor environment. Whether used for marketing visuals, presentations, or educational content, every image and text appears sharp, rich, and lifelike — no pixelation, no compromise.

🔄 Portrait & Landscape Orientation Flexibility

The CDE5514-2C adapts perfectly to your setup. Whether mounted horizontally for presentations or vertically for digital signage, its dual orientation support allows maximum creativity and flexibility for your visual communication needs. It’s an ideal choice for retail advertising, menu boards, and interactive campus displays.

🌙 Designed for 24/7 Commercial Use

Built to perform around the clock, this commercial-grade display operates seamlessly 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. With a brightness of 500 nits, contrast ratio of 1200:1 (2000:1 DCR), and a 50,000-hour backlight life, it guarantees long-term reliability and crystal-clear images — even in bright indoor spaces.

💡 Effortless USB Media Playback

With scheduled USB media playback, you can display videos, images, and audio directly from a USB drive. The Auto-Play and resume-last-source functions ensure your content runs automatically — no PC needed. Perfect for unattended digital signage or promotional displays that need to run continuously.

🔄 Signal Failover — Always Stay Connected

Never worry about signal interruptions again. If the primary source disconnects, the Signal Failover feature automatically switches to the next available input, such as another HDMI or USB-C port. This intelligent function ensures uninterrupted playback in high-traffic environments like malls, transportation hubs, and corporate lobbies.

🔌 One-Cable USB-C Connectivity

Simplify your setup with USB-C one-cable connectivity. Transmit video, audio, Ethernet, data, and even 15W power — all through a single cable. Ideal for meeting rooms, collaborative workspaces, and shared offices, this plug-and-play feature eliminates cable clutter and enables instant presentations.

📡 Wireless Screen Casting with ViewShare

Make collaboration effortless with the optional ViewShare WPD-900 Wireless Screen Casting Kit (sold separately). Cast directly from your laptop or mobile device in Full HD without Wi-Fi or software installation. With secure point-to-point connectivity and one-click user switching, team collaboration becomes smoother and more efficient — no cables, no delays.

🔊 Built-In Dual Speakers for Complete Audio

Enjoy clear, powerful sound right out of the box. The dual 10W built-in speakers provide excellent audio for smaller spaces such as huddle rooms and classrooms. For larger venues or premium setups, the 3.5mm audio output connects easily to external sound systems, offering full AV flexibility.

🌐 Remote Device Management for IT Efficiency

Managing multiple displays has never been easier. With ViewSonic Manager, IT administrators can control settings, inputs, and system health remotely via a web-based interface. The integrated Remote Desktop feature also enables quick troubleshooting, reducing on-site maintenance time and costs.

🌱 Environmentally Responsible Design

The ViewSonic CDE5514-2C reflects the brand’s commitment to sustainability. It is EPEAT Silver rated, ENERGY STAR® certified, and RoHS compliant, minimizing environmental impact while maximizing energy efficiency. This display aligns with global green standards and contributes to a smarter, more sustainable workspace.

⚙️ Key Specifications

Display: 55” TFT LCD (DLED Backlight)
Resolution: 3840 x 2160 (4K UHD)
Brightness: 500 nits (typical)
Contrast Ratio: 1200:1 (typ.) / 2000:1 (DCR enabled)
Response Time: 8ms
Viewing Angle: 178° (H/V)
Processor: Quad-core ARM Cortex-A73
RAM: 4GB DDR4
Storage: 32GB
Inputs: 3x HDMI (HDMI 2.1 4K@60Hz), USB-C, Audio Out, LAN, RS-232
Speakers: 2x10W
Orientation: Landscape & Portrait
Mounting: VESA 400x400mm
Backlight Life: 50,000 hours

💼 Ideal For:

  • Corporate boardrooms & meeting spaces

  • Educational institutions & lecture halls

  • Retail stores & shopping centers

  • Hotels, airports, and public displays

  • 24/7 digital signage applications

With its combination of brilliant 4K visuals, smooth performance, versatile orientation, and professional-grade durability, the ViewSonic CDE5514-2C 55” 4K Commercial Display is built to deliver clear communication and captivating visuals that engage your audience — anytime, anywhere.

fields.description:

With adjustable DPI levels up to 14,400, customizable buttons, and stunning RGB lighting, this mouse is built to enhance both comfort and performance for every session—whether it’s intense gaming, designing, or daily computing.

Unmatched Precision with Adjustable DPI
The Redragon M907 offers 5 adjustable DPI levels (1000, 2000, 4000, 7200, 14400) and allows fine-tuning in increments of ±100 through software. This means you can perfectly calibrate your mouse sensitivity to match your play style, giving you maximum control and pinpoint accuracy in every movement.

8 Programmable Buttons & RGB Customization
Take full control of your gameplay with 8 programmable buttons, enabling quick access to essential commands. With 16 million color 'breathing' RGB LED lighting and 5 memory profiles, you can customize the mouse to match your setup and instantly identify each profile. Your gaming atmosphere will never feel the same again.

Comfortable & Ergonomic Design
Designed for long hours of gaming or work, the M907 delivers superior comfort and precision at your fingertips. Its ergonomic shape ensures natural hand placement, reducing fatigue while giving you the clicking experience you want—quiet yet responsive, perfect for libraries, offices, or late-night gaming marathons.

Professional Software for Total Customization
The included professional software allows you to program buttons, set DPI, polling rate, mouse speed, and create multi-key combinations (up to 19 keys). Fine-tune every aspect of your mouse for an optimized, personalized gaming experience.

Durable & Reliable Build
Crafted for gamers who demand longevity, the M907 is built with high-quality materials that withstand intense clicking and movement. Its braided USB cable and solid construction ensure durability, making it a reliable partner in your gaming setup.

Universal Compatibility
Compatible with Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/ME/2000 and Mac OS 10.x, the Redragon M907 works seamlessly across platforms, making it an ideal choice for all gamers and professionals.

Key Features:
